tika-abh09t:1832_15: ca dukkhatā veditabbā, na dukkhadukkhavasenāti ayaṃ dukkhasacce nayo.
tika-abh09t:1833_0: Samudayasaccaṃ pana “kāmataṇhā bhavataṇhā vibhavataṇhā”ti tattakameva uddisitvā “sā
tika-abh09t:1833_1: kho panesā taṇhā kattha uppajjamānā uppajjatī”ti pucchitvā channaṃ channaṃ indriyavisayaviññāṇaphassavedanāsaññācetanātaṇhāvitakkavicārānaṃ
tika-abh09t:1833_2: visayabhūtānaṃ vasena taṇhāya “etthesā taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjatī”ti evaṃ uppattiṃ
tika-abh09t:1834_0: Nirodhasaccaṃ pana “tassā eva taṇhāya asesavirāganirodho cāgo paṭinissaggo mutti
tika-abh09t:1834_1: anālayo”ti vatvā puna “sā kho panesā taṇhā kattha nirujjhamānā nirujjhatī”ti pucchitvā
tika-abh09t:1834_2: samudayasacce vuttaindriyādīnaṃ vasena paṭilomato taṇhāya nirodhaṃ pakāsetvā vitthārato
tika-abh09t:1834_3: vibhattaṃ. Tattha asesavirāganirodhotiādīni padāni nibbānavevacanāni. Nibbānaṃ hi
tika-abh09t:1834_4: āgamma taṇhā asesā virajjati, nirujjhati, cajīyati, paṭinissajjīyati, muccati, na
tika-abh09t:1834_5: allīyati, tasmā “asesavirāganirodho cāgo paṭinissaggo mutti anālayo”ti vuccati. Ekameva
tika-abh09t:1834_6: hi nibbānaṃ, nāmāni panassa sabbasaṅkhatānaṃ nāmapaṭipakkhavasena anekāni honti.
tika-abh09t:1835_0: Nanu pāṭekkaṃ nibbānaṃ nāma natthi, kilesakkhayamattameva nibbānaṃ, teneva ca tāsu
tika-abh09t:1835_1: tāsu suttābhidhammadesanāsu “rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo”tiādinā vuttanti ce? Na, arahattanibbānānaṃ
tika-abh09t:1835_2: ekatāpajjanato. Arahattampi hi “yo kho, āvuso, rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo,
tika-abh09t:1835_3: idaṃ vuccati arahatta”nti rāgādīnaṃ parikkhayante uppannattā upacārena arahattaṃ
tika-abh09t:1835_4: rāgakkhayādibhāvena vuccati, tathā rāgādīnaṃ khayahetuttā nibbānampi rāgakkhayādibhāvena
tika-abh09t:1835_5: vuttanti gahetabbaṃ. Itarathā nibbānassa bahuttaṃ āpajjati rāgādīnaṃ bahunnaṃ khayassāpi
tika-abh09t:1835_6: bahuttā. Sabbakilesānampi khayassa ekattena paṭhamamaggena diṭṭhiādīnaṃ khaye sabbakilesakkhayo
tika-abh09t:1835_7: āpajjati, oḷārikattañcassa siyā tiracchānānampi uppannarāgakkhayassa pākaṭattena
tika-abh09t:1835_8: nibbānappattito, gotrabhūkkhaṇepi ca rāgādikkhayo hoti gotrabhuno nibbānavisayattā,
tika-abh09t:1835_9: maggassa pana nibbānārammaṇatāappasaṅgo. Na hi attanā khepiyamānakilesakkhayamārabbha
tika-abh09t:1835_10: maggo uppajjati, abhāvo cassa āpajjati rāgādikkhayabhūtassa pana abhāvassa pakkhavasena
tika-abh09t:1835_11: tuccharūpattā, tassāpi bhāvattābhāvāva vivekalakkhaṇaṃ na siyā, saṅkhatatā cassa
tika-abh09t:1835_12: siyā. Na hi kadāci upalabbhamānaṃ asaṅkhataṃ bhavitumarahati sabbesampi ahetukattāpattito,
tika-abh09t:1835_13: saṅkhatattepi cassa na nibbānattaṃ uppattijarābhaṅgasamaṅgitāya dukkhattā, tathā
tika-abh09t:1835_14: ca abhāvassāpi abhāvo, anavaṭṭhānañca khīṇānampi rāgādīnaṃ puna uppajjanaṃ yesaṃ
tika-abh09t:1836_0: Apica kāraṇantarena vā bhāve uppanne rāgādīnaṃ na kāci hāni hoti. Na hi aññassuppattiyaṃ
tika-abh09t:1836_1: aññaṃ vigacchati. Abhāvo bhāvassa virodhi, virodhisannidhāne ca itaraṃ vigacchatīti
tika-abh09t:1836_2: ce? Kimidaṃ vigamanaṃ nāma. Yadi tampi bhāvarūpaṃ, samānadosatā cassa siyā anavaṭṭhānañca,
tika-abh09t:1836_3: na ca atthasiddhi. Yadi tuccharūpaṃ, kiṃ paṭhamamevassa tuccharūpatāya upagatāya
tika-abh09t:1836_4: dūrampi gantvā upagantabbāti siddhā, rāgādikkhayabhūtassa nibbānassa tuccharūpatāya
tika-abh09t:1836_5: abhāvo, na ca abhāvo eva nibbānaṃ. Atītānāgatadosānamabhāve nibbānappattiyā abhāvato
tika-abh09t:1836_6: vattamānānañca abhāvo nāma. Abhāvo nāma na kilesavigamamatto, api tu anuppattibhāvena.
tika-abh09t:1836_7: Accantavigamo nibbānenāpi sampādīyatīti ce? Na, tassa kāraṇabhāvā. Vipassanā kāraṇamiti
tika-abh09t:1836_9: anuppattito. Yadi hi uppajjeyya, tāya sabbepi sattā vimuttā eva siyuṃ, no ca kadāci
tika-abh09t:1836_10: na puccheyya viruddhadhammadassanābhāvā. Na hi dassanaṃ vinā vikappo sambhavati,
tika-abh09t:1836_11: na ca attāti vikappajanakarūpādidassanameva tabbiruddhavikappajanakaṃ hoti. Buddhānañca
tika-abh09t:1836_12: paramparopadesena rūpādīsu vipassanāvikappo uppajjatīti ce? Na, tesampi viruddhadassanābhāvena
tika-abh09t:1836_13: vipassanāvikappānuppattito. Na hi yādisāya kāraṇasāmaggiyā yādisaṃ kāriyaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh09t:1836_14: tādisāya eva tabbiruddhaṃ uppajjati ahetukattappasaṅgato. Na ca viruddhadassanābhāvena
tika-abh09t:1836_16: tadupadeso ca sambhavati. Tilakkhaṇūpadesanānantarikatāya pana buddhānaṃ nibbānasacchikiriyā
tika-abh09t:1836_17: siddhi, tenevassa kilesānamaccantappahānassa, vipassanopadesasāmatthiyassa ca siddhīti
tika-abh09t:1837_0: Kasmā pana nibbānadassanena rāgādīnaṃ accantappahānaṃ, tilakkhaṇañca hoti. Na hi
tika-abh09t:1837_1: aññassa dassanena itararāgappahānaṃ, tilakkhaṇañāṇañca yuttanti? Na, asaṅkhatadassanena
tika-abh09t:1837_2: saṅkhatassa vā dosassa vā pākaṭattā. Diṭṭhaaccantasukhānaṃ hi vaṭṭasukhe, tannissayārammaṇādīsu
tika-abh09t:1837_3: ca sukhābhimāno, vaṭṭābhirati ca pahīyati diṭṭhaparatīrassa nāvikassa nāvāyekadese
tika-abh09t:1837_4: sukhābhimānābhiratiyo viya. Apica saṅkhatadhammesu allinā rāgādayo asaṅkhatadhamme
tika-abh09t:1837_5: saṇṭhātuṃ na sakkonti aggikkhandhe viya makkhikā, thale viya ca jalacarā, nibbānadassanena
tika-abh09t:1837_6: pahīnadosassa cittassa yāthāvato tesu saṅkhatesu tilakkhaṇadassanaṃ sambhavati bhesajjālepena
tika-abh09t:1837_7: vihatakācatimirādidosassa cakkhuno ghaṭādirūpadassanaṃ viya, diṭṭhadosesu cassa saṅkhāresu
tika-abh09t:1837_8: na puna rāgādīnamuppatti ñātā sucibhāve viya vaccakūpeti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh09t:1838_0: Kasmā pana kesañci sattānaṃ eva nibbānasacchikiriyāsambhavo, na sabbesanti? Anādibuddhaparamparopadesasāpekkhattā,
tika-abh09t:1838_1: tesañca upadesakānaṃ sabbattha sabbadā abhāvato, sotūnañca khaṇasampattiyā accantadullabhattā,
tika-abh09t:1838_2: cakkavāḷānañca anantattā, tasmā keci eva buddhuppādakāle tilakkhaṇopadesalābhena
tika-abh09t:1839_0: Kathaṃ panettha rāgādīnaṃ accantavigamo nibbānena sādhīyatīti? Na tāva so, atītānāgatānaṃ
tika-abh09t:1839_1: tesamidāni abhāvā, pubbe ca tassa vijjamānattā, vattamānānaṃ sarasanirodhato. Kathañcassa
tika-abh09t:1839_2: tuccharūpassa nibbānassa hetutte yathāvuttadosānamavasaroti ce? Na, tassa bhāvarūpattā.
tika-abh09t:1839_3: Pubbabhāgapaṭipattiyā hi nibbānamārabbha anusayājananabhāvena uppannamaggā eva kilesānamanuppādanirodho
tika-abh09t:1839_4: taduppattiyā āyatiṃ uppajjanārahānaṃ anuppattito aggisannidhāne aṅkurājanakabhāvena
tika-abh09t:1839_5: uppannasālikkhandhassa bījatābhāvarūpatā viya. Na hi abhāvo nāma koci paramatthato
tika-abh09t:1839_6: atthi, yo kāraṇena janīyati tabbiruddhakkhaṇuppādanabhāvovuppādanaṃ anekakkhaṇuppādanena
tika-abh09t:1839_7: khandhakārābhāvuppādanaṃ viya, tasmā kilesānaṃ anuppattinirodhasaṅkhātassa ariyamaggassa
tika-abh09t:1839_9: kasmā na vuttanti ce? Abhisukhumattā, anupaladdhapubbattā ca, sukhumatā cassa bhagavato
tika-abh09t:1839_10: appossukkatāvacanato, ariyena cakkhunā passitabbato ca veditabbā.
tika-abh09t:1840_0: Ettha pana paravādī āha – “nattheva nibbānaṃ anupalabbhanīyato”ti. Na anupalabbhanīyaṃ
tika-abh09t:1840_1: tassa siddhattā. Upalabbhati hi taṃ tadanurūpapaṭipattiyā ariyehi. Apica nibbānaṃ
tika-abh09t:1840_2: natthīti na vattabbaṃ sabbasattānaṃ viruddhadhammānaṃ bhāvena apavaggābhāvappasaṅgato.
tika-abh09t:1840_3: Na ca taṃ yuttaṃ uṇhādipaṭipakkhassa sītādino viya bhavapaṭipakkhassa nibbānassapi
tika-abh09t:1843_0: Ādi. Accantanirodhahetuno vipassanopadesassa dassanato ca attheva nibbānaṃ taṃ vinā
tika-abh09t:1843_1: tassāsambhavatoti vuttovāyamattho. Tadetaṃ purimāya koṭiyā abhāvato appabhavaṃ, tatova
tika-abh09t:1843_2: ajarāmaraṇaṃ, niccañca hotīti aṇuādīnampi niccabhāvapatti nibbānasseva niccattāti
tika-abh09t:1843_3: ce? Na, bhinnādhikaraṇattena hetulakkhaṇassānupapattito. Aṇuādīnampi asaṅkhatatā
tika-abh09t:1843_4: iti ce? Na, asaṅkhatatāsiddhito asaṅkhatānañcānekattānupapattito. Yadi hi asaṅkhataṃ
tika-abh09t:1843_5: nāma bhaveyya, ekeneva bhavitabbaṃ desakālasabhāvabhedassa kāraṇabhedakattā, bhinnasabhāvānampi
tika-abh09t:1844_0: Saṅkhatehi sabhāvabhinnassa nibbānassa kathaṃ ahetukatāti ce? Asaṅkhatasabhāvena
tika-abh09t:1844_1: saṅkhatasabhāvehi bhinnassa kāraṇānapekkhattā. Asaṅkhatatte hi samāne bhavasabhāvabhedo
tika-abh09t:1844_2: kāraṇabhedaṃ sūcayati, tasmā ekameva niccaṃ bhavitumarahati, tañca yathāvuttayuttito,
tika-abh09t:1844_3: sabbaññuvacanato ca paramatthato vijjamānaṃ nibbānameva. Vuttaṃ hetaṃ bhagavatā “atthi,
tika-abh09t:1844_4: bhikkhave, ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhata”nti. Ayaṃ dukkhanirodhasacce nayo.
tika-abh09t:1845: Itaraṃ pana “sammādiṭṭhi…pe… sammāsamādhī”ti uddisitvā vitthārato vibhattaṃ. Vinicchayo panettha maggaṅgavibhaṅge āvi bhavissatīti ayaṃ suttantabhājanīyanayo.
tika-abh09t:1847_0: “Cattāri saccāni dukkhaṃ dukkhasamudayo dukkhanirodho dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā.
tika-abh09t:1847_1: Tattha taṇhā dukkhasamudayo. Avasesā sāsavadhammā…pe… dukkhaṃ. Taṇhāya pahānaṃ dukkhanirodho.
tika-abh09t:1848_0: Vatvā aṭṭha maggaṅgāni vitthārato niddisitvā “avasesā dhammā dukkhanirodhagāminiyā
tika-abh09t:1848_1: paṭipadāya sampayuttā”ti evaṃ paṭhamavāre cattāri saccāni vibhattāni. Tāni puna aparehipi
tika-abh09t:1848_2: “taṇhā, avasesā ca kilesā samudayo, tathā taṇhā, avasesā ca kilesā, avasesā ca akusalā
tika-abh09t:1848_3: samudayo, tathā taṇhā, avasesā ca kilesā, avasesā ca akusalā, tīṇi ca kusalamūlāni,
tika-abh09t:1848_4: sāsavāni samudayo, tathā taṇhā, avasesā ca kilesā, avasesā ca akusalā, tīṇi ca kusalamūlāni,
tika-abh09t:1848_5: sāsavāni, avasesā ca sāsavakusaladhammā samudayo. Avasesā sāsavadhammā dukkhaṃ, tassa
tika-abh09t:1848_6: tassa samudayassa pahānaṃ nirodho, aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo paṭipadā”ti imehi vārehi vibhattāni.
tika-abh09t:1848_7: Tattha “ariyasaccānī”ti avatvā nippadesato paccayasaṅkhātaṃ samudayaṃ dassetuṃ “saccānī”ti
tika-abh09t:1848_8: vuttaṃ. Ariyasaccesu hi taṇhāva samudayo, na itare. Na ca kevalaṃ taṇhāva dukkhaṃ
tika-abh09t:1848_9: samudāneti, avasesā kusalākusalāpi paccayaṃ samudānentiyevāti tepi samudayato dassetuṃ
tika-abh09t:1848_10: “saccāni”tveva vuttaṃ. Tato paraṃ yasmā aṭṭhaṅgiko maggova paṭipadāti. Sampayuttā
tika-abh09t:1848_11: pana phassādayo sabbepi dhammā paṭipadā eva, tasmā taṃ nayaṃ dassetuṃ sabbasaṅgāhikavārepi
tika-abh09t:1848_12: sabbāni vibhattāni. Ettha hi ariyadhanāneva saṅgahitāni. Sesaṃ sadisamevāti ayaṃ
tika-abh09t:1849_0: Pañhāpucchakanaye pana catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ kati kusalā…pe… kati araṇā? Samudayasaccaṃ
tika-abh09t:1849_1: akusalaṃ, nirodhasaccaṃ abyākataṃ, dukkhasaccaṃ tidhāpi. Samudayo savitakkasavicāro,
tika-abh09t:1849_2: nirodho avitakkaavicāro, maggo tidhāpi, dukkhaṃ tidhāpi, na vattabbaṃ ca. Tīṇi saccāni
tika-abh09t:1849_3: anidassanaappaṭighāni, dukkhaṃ tidhāpi. Samudayo hetu, nirodho na hetu, sesā dvidhāpi.
tika-abh09t:1849_4: Dve saccāni lokiyāni, magganirodhā lokuttarā. Samudayasaccaṃ saraṇaṃ, dve saccāni
tika-abh09t:1849_5: araṇāni, dukkhaṃ duvidhāpi. Ayaṃ pañhāpucchakanayo. Idāni panettha –
tika-abh09t:1852_0: Tattha kamato tāva idhāpi desanākkamova yujjati. Ettha oḷārikattā, sabbasattasādhāraṇattā
tika-abh09t:1852_1: ca suviññeyyanti dukkhasaccaṃ paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ, tato tasseva hetudassanatthaṃ samudayasaccaṃ,
tika-abh09t:1852_3: ante maggasaccaṃ. Bhavasukhassādagadhitānaṃ saṃvegajananatthaṃ paṭhamaṃ dukkhamāha,
tika-abh09t:1852_4: tato “bhavaṃ neva ahetukaṃ āgacchati, na issaranimmānādinā hoti, ito pana hotī”ti
tika-abh09t:1852_5: ñāpanatthaṃ samudayasaccaṃ, tato sahetukena dukkhena abhibhūtattā saṃviggamānasānaṃ
tika-abh09t:1852_6: tannissaraṇadassanena assāsajananatthaṃ nirodhaṃ, tato nirodhasampāpakaṃ magganti ayamettha kamo.
tika-abh09t:1853_0: Anūnādhikato pana kasmā cattāri eva saccānīti ce? Tato aññassa asambhavato, aññatarassa
tika-abh09t:1853_1: ca anapaneyyato. Apica pavattimācikkhanto bhagavā sahetukaṃ ācikkhati, nivattiñca
tika-abh09t:1853_2: saupāyaṃ. Iti pavattinivattitadubhayahetūnaṃ etaparamato cattāri eva vuttānīti ayametthānūnādhikato.
tika-abh09t:1854_0: Lakkhaṇādīhi panettha lakkhaṇato bādhanalakkhaṇaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ, santāpanarasaṃ, pavattipaccupaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-abh09t:1854_4: paṭipāṭiyā, tathā saṅkhatataṇhāasaṅkhatadassanalakkhaṇāni cāti imānettha lakkhaṇāni.
tika-abh09t:1855: Suññato panetāni yathākkamaṃ vedakakārakanibbutagamakābhāvato suññāni. Vuttañca –
tika-abh09t:1865_0: Nirodhasuññāni vā tīṇi. Nirodho ca sesattayasuñño. Phalasuñño vā hettha hetu samudayamaggesu
tika-abh09t:1865_1: dukkhanirodhānaṃ abhāvā pakativādīnaṃ pakati viya. Hetusuññañca phalaṃ dukkhasamudayānaṃ,
tika-abh09t:1865_2: nirodhamaggānañca asamavāyā, na hetusamavetaṃ hetuphalaṃ. Hetuphalasamavāyavādīnaṃ
tika-abh09t:1866_0: Ñāṇakiccatoti ettha duvidhaṃ saccañāṇaṃ anubodhañāṇaṃ, paṭivedhañāṇañca. Tattha anubodhañāṇaṃ
tika-abh09t:1866_1: lokiyaṃ, taṃ anussavādivasena nirodhe, magge ca pavattati. Paṭivedhañāṇaṃ lokuttaraṃ,
tika-abh09t:1866_2: taṃ saccāvabodhapaṭipakkhakilese khepentaṃ nirodhamārammaṇaṃ katvā kiccato cattāripi
tika-abh09t:1866_3: saccāni paṭivijjhati. Yaṃ panetaṃ lokiyaṃ, tattha dukkhañāṇaṃ pariyuṭṭhānābhibhavanavasena
tika-abh09t:1866_4: pavattamānaṃ sakkāyadiṭṭhiṃ nivatteti, samudayañāṇaṃ ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ, nirodhañāṇaṃ
tika-abh09t:1866_5: sassatadiṭṭhiṃ, maggañāṇaṃ akiriyadiṭṭhiṃ. Dukkhañāṇaṃ vā tesu dhuvasubhasukhattabhāvarahitesu
tika-abh09t:1866_8: vippaṭipattiṃ, nirodhañāṇaṃ arūpalokādīsu apavaggaggāhabhūtaṃ nirodhe vippaṭipattiṃ,
tika-abh09t:1866_10: pavattaṃ upāye vippaṭipattiṃ nivatteti. Idamettha ñāṇakiccaṃ.
tika-abh09t:1867_0: Upamāto panettha bhāro viya hi dukkhasaccaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, bhārādānamiva samudayasaccaṃ,
tika-abh09t:1867_1: bhāranikkhepanamiva nirodhasaccaṃ, bhāranikkhepanupāyo viya maggasaccaṃ. Apica rogatannidānatadupasamabhesajjehi,
tika-abh09t:1867_3: etāni upamāto veditabbāni. Ayamettha upamā. Evaṃ ñeyyo pāḷimuttavinicchayo.
tika-abh09t:1870_0: Indriyavibhaṅgamātikāya pana atthato tāva – dvāvīsati indriyānīti ettha indriyaṭṭhasambhavato
tika-abh09t:1870_1: indriyāni. Ko panesa indriyaṭṭho nāmāti? Indaliṅgaṭṭho, indadesitaṭṭho, indadiṭṭhaṭṭho,
tika-abh09t:1870_2: indasiṭṭhaṭṭho, indajuṭṭhaṭṭho ca, so sabbopi idha yathāyogaṃ yujjati. Kusalākusalaṃ
tika-abh09t:1870_3: kammaṃ indo nāma kammesu kassaci issariyābhāvato, tenevettha kammasañjanitāni tāva
tika-abh09t:1870_4: indriyāni attano janakakammaṃ ulliṅgenti, tena ca siṭṭhānīti indaliṅgaṭṭhena, indasiṭṭhaṭṭhena
tika-abh09t:1870_5: ca indriyāni. Sammāsambuddho pana paramissariyabhāvato indo, tato sabbānipetāni indriyāni
tika-abh09t:1870_6: bhagavatā yathābhūtato pakāsitāni, abhisambuddhāni cāti indadesitaṭṭhena, indadiṭṭhaṭṭhena
tika-abh09t:1870_7: ca indriyāni. Teneva bhagavatā kānici gocarāsevanāya, kānici bhāvanāsevanāya sevitānīti
tika-abh09t:1870_8: indajuṭṭhaṭṭhenapi indriyāni. Apica ādhipaccasaṅkhātena issariyaṭṭhenāpi etāni indriyāni.
tika-abh09t:1871_0: Cakkhundriyantiādīsu cakkhādīnaṃ padattho heṭṭhā pakāsito. Pacchimesu pana tīsu pubbabhāge
tika-abh09t:1871_1: anaññātaṃ amataṃ padaṃ, catusaccadhammaṃ vā jānissāmīti evaṃ paṭipannassa uppajjanato,
tika-abh09t:1871_2: indriyaṭṭhasambhavato ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ. Ājānanato aññā eva indriyanti
tika-abh09t:1871_3: aññindriyaṃ. Aññātāvino catūsu saccesu niṭṭhitañāṇakiccassa khīṇāsavassa indriyanti
tika-abh09t:1871_5: rūpādīnaṃ niyatabhāvassa, attano tikkhamandatānuvidhānassa ca āpādanato ādhipaccaṃ
tika-abh09t:1871_6: veditabbaṃ. Manindriyādīnaṃ pana attano attano vijānanādilakkhaṇe ādhipaccaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh09t:1872_0: Dhammabhedato panettha jīvitindriyaṃ rūpārūpavasena dvidhā. Sukhindriyādīni pañca
tika-abh09t:1872_1: vedanābhāvato ekadhammo, tathā paññindriyādīni cattāri amohabhāvato. Sesāni pana
tika-abh09t:1872_2: indriyāni ekekadhammā evāti evaṃ paramatthato soḷasa dhammāva dvāvīsatindriyabhāvena
tika-abh09t:1872_3: desitāni. Sesāni panettha cetasikarūpanibbānāni asaṅgahitānīti ayaṃ dhammabhedo.
tika-abh09t:1873_0: Vibhaṅganayato panettha suttantabhājanīyaṃ nāma na gahitaṃ. Kasmā? Suttante imāya
tika-abh09t:1873_1: paṭipāṭiyā dvāvīsatiyā indriyānaṃ anāgatattā. Suttantasmiṃ hi katthaci dve indriyāni
tika-abh09t:1873_2: kathitāni, katthaci tīṇi, katthaci pañca, evaṃ pana nirantaraṃ dvāvīsati āgatāni
tika-abh09t:1874_0: Pañhāpucchakanaye pana dvāvīsatiyā indriyānaṃ kati kusalā…pe… kati araṇāti? Anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ
tika-abh09t:1874_1: kusalaṃ, domanassindriyaṃ akusalaṃ, saddhāsatipaññāaññindriyāni cattāri kusalābyākatāni,
tika-abh09t:1874_3: Cha indriyāni siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttāti,
tika-abh09t:1874_4: tīṇi tidhāpi, jīvitaṃ tidhā ca na vattabbañca, dvādasindriyāni na vattabbāni eva.
tika-abh09t:1874_5: Tīṇi vipākāni, dve vipākadhammadhammāni, rūpindriyāni satta nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammāni,
tika-abh09t:1874_6: aññindriyaṃ siyā vipākaṃ, siyā vipākadhammadhammaṃ, navindriyāni tidhāpi. Navindriyāni
tika-abh09t:1874_8: nava tidhāpi. Domanassindriyaṃ savitakkasavicāraṃ, upekkhindriyaṃ tathā ca avitakkaavicārañca,
tika-abh09t:1874_9: nava avitakkaavicārāni, ekādasa tidhāpi. Satta rūpindriyāni ceva sukhadukkhadomanassindriyāni
tika-abh09t:1874_10: cāti dasa parittāni, pacchimāni tīṇi appamāṇāni, sesāni nava tidhāva. Tattha ca somanassindriyaṃ
tika-abh09t:1874_11: rūpāvacaravaseneva mahaggataṃ, tadavasesāni arūpāvacaravasenāpīti veditabbaṃ. Pañcindriyāni
tika-abh09t:1875_0: Paññindriyādīni cattāri hetū, sesā na hetū…pe… domanassindriyaṃ saraṇaṃ, manajīvitasomanassaupekkhāvīriyasamādhindriyāni
tika-abh09t:1875_1: dvidhāpi, sesāni pannarasa araṇānevāti ayaṃ pañhāpucchakanayo.
tika-abh09t:1878_0: Kamatoti ayampi desanākkamova. Tattha ajjhattadhamme pariññāya ariyabhūmipaṭilābho
tika-abh09t:1878_1: hotīti attabhāvapariyāpannāni cakkhundriyādīni paṭhamaṃ desitāni. So manussattabhāvo
tika-abh09t:1878_2: yaṃ dhammaṃ upādāya “itthī”ti vā “puriso”ti vā saṅkhaṃ gacchati, “ayaṃ so”ti nidassanatthaṃ
tika-abh09t:1878_3: tato itthindriyaṃ, purisindriyañca. So duvidhopi jīvitindriyapaṭibaddhavuttīti ñāpanatthaṃ
tika-abh09t:1878_4: tato jīvitindriyaṃ. Yāva tassa pavatti, tāva etesaṃ vedayitānaṃ anivatti. Yañca kiñci
tika-abh09t:1878_5: vedayitaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ sukhaṃ dukkhanti ñāpanatthaṃ tato sukhindriyādīni. Tannirodhatthaṃ
tika-abh09t:1878_6: pana ete dhammā bhāvetabbāti paṭipattidassanatthaṃ tato saddhādīni. “Imāya paṭipattiyā
tika-abh09t:1878_7: esa dhammo paṭhamaṃ attani pātubhavatī”ti paṭipattiyā amoghabhāvadassanatthaṃ tato
tika-abh09t:1878_8: anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ. Tasseva phalattā, tato anantaraṃ bhāvetabbattā ca tato
tika-abh09t:1878_9: aññindriyaṃ. Ito paraṃ bhāvanāya imassa adhigamo, adhigate ca pana imasmiṃ natthi
tika-abh09t:1878_10: kiñci uttari karaṇīyanti ñāpanatthaṃ ante paramassāsabhūtaṃ aññātāvindriyaṃ desitanti
tika-abh09t:1881_0: Paccayākāravibhaṅgamātikāya pana atthato tāva – avijjāpaccayātiādīsu avindiyaṃ kāyaduccaritādiṃ
tika-abh09t:1881_1: vindati paṭilabhati, vindiyaṃ vā kāyasucaritādiṃ na vindati, dhammānaṃ vā yathāsabhāvaṃ
tika-abh09t:1881_2: aviditaṃ karoti, antavirahite vā saṃsāre satte javāpeti, avijjamānesu vā javati,
tika-abh09t:1881_3: vijjamānesu vā na javatīti avijjā. Paṭicca phalameti etasmāti paccayo, dhammānaṃ
tika-abh09t:1881_4: uppattiyā, ṭhitiyā ca upakārako dhammo. Avijjā ca sā paccayo cāti avijjāpaccayo,
tika-abh09t:1882_0: Ito paraṃ saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇantiādīsu vuttaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Avuttesu
tika-abh09t:1882_1: pana vijānātīti viññāṇaṃ. Namatīti nāmaṃ, ruppatīti rūpaṃ, nāmañca rūpañca nāmarūpañca
tika-abh09t:1882_2: nāmarūpanti ekadesasarūpekasesanayena veditabbaṃ. Āye tanoti, āyatañca nayatīti āyatanaṃ,
tika-abh09t:1882_3: chaṭṭhāyatanañca saḷāyatanañca saḷāyatananti ekasesanayena veditabbaṃ. Phusatīti
tika-abh09t:1882_4: phasso. Vedayatīti vedanā. Paritassatīti taṇhā. Upādiyatīti upādānaṃ. Bhavati, bhāvayati
tika-abh09t:1882_5: cāti bhavo. Jananaṃ jāti. Jīraṇaṃ jarā. Maranti etenāti maraṇaṃ. Socanaṃ soko. Paridevanaṃ
tika-abh09t:1882_6: paridevo. Dukkhayati, uppādaṭṭhitivasena dvidhā khaṇatītipi dukkhaṃ. Dummanassa bhāvo
tika-abh09t:1882_7: domanassaṃ. Bhuso āyāso upāyāso. Sambhavantīti nibbattanti. Na kevalañca sokādīheva,
tika-abh09t:1882_8: atha kho avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā sambhavantītiādinā sabbapadehipi sambhavanti-saddassa
tika-abh09t:1882_9: yojanā kātabbā. Evaṃ hi paccayapaccayuppannavavatthānaṃ kataṃ hoti.
tika-abh09t:1883_0: Evanti niddiṭṭhanayanidassanaṃ, tena avijjādīheva kāraṇehi, na issaranimmānādīhīti
tika-abh09t:1883_1: dasseti. Etassāti yathāvuttassa. Kevalassāti asammissassa, sakalassa vā, dukkhakkhandhassāti
tika-abh09t:1883_2: dukkhasamūhassa, na sattassa, na sukhasubhādīnaṃ. Samudayoti nibbatti, hotīti sambhavati.
tika-abh09t:1884_0: Dhammabhedato panettha avijjāti suttantapariyāyena dukkhādīsu catūsu, abhidhammapariyāyena
tika-abh09t:1884_1: pubbantādīhi saddhiṃ aṭṭhasu vā ṭhānesu aññāṇaṃ. Saṅkhārā pana puññāpuññāneñjābhisaṅkhārā
tika-abh09t:1884_2: tayo, kāyavacīcittasaṅkhārā tayo cāti chabbidhā. Tattha aṭṭha kāmāvacarakusalacetanā,
tika-abh09t:1884_3: pañca rūpāvacarakusalacetanā ceti terasa cetanā puññābhisaṅkhāro nāma. Dvādasa akusalacetanā
tika-abh09t:1884_4: apuññābhisaṅkhāro nāma. Catasso arūpāvacarakusalacetanā āneñjābhisaṅkhāro nāma. Imesaṃ
tika-abh09t:1884_5: pana tiṇṇaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ eva dvārato pavattidassanatthaṃ ayaṃ saṅkhārādittiko vutto.
tika-abh09t:1885_0: Aṭṭha kāmāvacarakusalacetanā ceva dvādasākusalacetanā ca kāyadvāre pavattiyaṃ kāyasaṅkhāro,
tika-abh09t:1885_1: vacīdvāre pavattiyaṃ vacīsaṅkhāro, etā ceva manodvāre pavattiyaṃ, manodvāre eva pavattanakā
tika-abh09t:1885_2: rūpārūpakusalacetanā ca cittasaṅkhāroti vuccanti. Abhiññācetanā, panettha uddhaccacetanā
tika-abh09t:1885_3: ca parato paṭisandhiviññāṇapaccayabhāve apanetabbāpi avijjāpaccayā sambhavato idha
tika-abh09t:1885_4: gahetabbāvāti ayaṃ tiko purimattikameva pavisatīti atthato lokiyakusalākusalacetanāva
tika-abh09t:1885_5: avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārāti veditabbaṃ. Idañca suttantabhājanīyanayena, abhidhammabhājanīyanayena
tika-abh09t:1885_6: pana lokiyalokuttare ekekacittakkhaṇe dvādasaṅgassa paṭiccasamuppādassa gahaṇato
tika-abh09t:1885_7: sabbāpi cetanā saṅkhārāti veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ viññāṇanāmarūpādīsupi sabbacittasampayuttavasena
tika-abh09t:1885_8: ca dhammabhedo veditabbo. Suttantabhājanīyanayeneva pana dassayissāma.
tika-abh09t:1886_1: hoti, lokuttarāni pana vaṭṭakathāya na yujjantīti na gahitāni. Viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ
tika-abh09t:1886_2: pana sabbalokiyaviññāṇasampayuttā tayo arūpino khandhā. Rūpaṃ sabbāni bhūtupādāyarūpāni.
tika-abh09t:1886_3: Saḷāyatanaṃ manacchaṭṭhāni indriyāni. Phasso cakkhusamphassādiko chavipākaphasso,
tika-abh09t:1886_4: tathā vedanāpi. Taṇhā rūpataṇhādibhedato chabbidho lobho. Upādānaṃ kāmupādānādito
tika-abh09t:1886_5: catubbidhā lobhadiṭṭhiyova. Bhavo pana duvidho kammabhavo, upapattibhavoti. Tattha
tika-abh09t:1886_6: kammabhavo tebhūmakakusalākusalacetanā ca taṃsampayuttā abhijjhādayo ca. Upapattibhavo
tika-abh09t:1886_7: pana kammābhinibbattā pañcapi khandhā. So pabhedato kāmarūpārūpabhavā tayo, saññā
tika-abh09t:1886_8: asaññā nevasaññānāsaññā bhavā tayo, ekacatupañcavokārabhavā tayoti navavidho niddiṭṭho.
tika-abh09t:1886_9: Jātiādīni pubbe vuttāni. Tesu jātiggahaṇena viññāṇanāmarūpasaḷāyatanaphassavedanāva
tika-abh09t:1886_10: gahitā tadavinābhāvato. Tathā jarāmaraṇaggahaṇenāpi tesaññeva pākabhedattā. Sokādayo
tika-abh09t:1886_11: pana jarāmaraṇena dvādasamena aṅgena ekasaṅkhepaṃ katvā vuttā, na visuṃ aṅgabhāvena.
tika-abh09t:1886_12: Kimatthanti ce? Bhavacakkassa avicchedadassanatthaṃ. Sokādito hi avijjā siddhā hoti
tika-abh09t:1886_13: avijjāvippayogato, avijjāsamuppattito ca. Jarāmaraṇabbhāhatassa hi bālasseva te sambhavanti,
tika-abh09t:1886_14: tehi ca avijjāya siddhāya puna avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārāti evaṃ hetuphalaparamparāya
tika-abh09t:1886_15: bhavacakkaṃ avicchinnaṃ, anādikaṃ, apariyantaṃ, apariyosānañca hoti.
tika-abh09t:1887_0: Yadi evaṃ, kasmā avijjā ādito vuttāti? Padhānadassanatthaṃ pana ādito vuttā. Tiṇṇaṃ
tika-abh09t:1887_1: hi vaṭṭānaṃ avijjā padhāno hetu tassā bhāve bhāvato, nirodhena ca nirujjhanato. Evaṃ
tika-abh09t:1887_2: avijjādīhi dvādasahi aṅgehi suttantabhājanīyanayena sabbe lokiyadhammāva paccayapaccayuppannabhāvena
tika-abh09t:1887_3: vuttāti veditabbā. Abhidhammapariyāyena pana lokuttarāpīti ayamettha dhammabhedo.
tika-abh09t:1888: Vibhaṅganayato panettha pañhāpucchakanayo natthi, suttantabhājanīyanayāpi dhammabhede vuttanayeneva vitthārato vibhattāti veditabbo. Abhidhammabhājanīye pana –
tika-abh09t:1889_0: “Avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayā
tika-abh09t:1889_1: chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā
tika-abh09t:1889_2: taṇhā, taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ, upādānapaccayā bhavo, bhavapaccayā jāti, jātipaccayā
tika-abh09t:1889_3: jarāmaraṇaṃ, evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hoti.
tika-abh09t:1890: “Avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro…pe… viññāṇapaccayā nāmaṃ, nāmapaccayā phasso…pe… samudayo hoti.
tika-abh09t:1891: “Avijjāpaccayā…pe… viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ, nāmarūpapaccayā chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso…pe… samudayo hoti.
tika-abh09t:1892: “Avijjāpaccayā …pe… viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ, nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanaṃ, chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso…pe… samudayo hotī”ti –
tika-abh09t:1893_0: Evaṃ paccayacatukkaṃ, puna “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro avijjāhetuko”tiādinā vuttanayeneva
tika-abh09t:1893_3: evaṃ avijjāmūlakāni cattāri catukkāni vuttāni. Evaṃ “saṅkhārapaccayā avijjā”tiādinā
tika-abh09t:1893_5: bāttiṃsa catukkāni mātikaṃ katvā nikkhipitvā puna akusalakusalavipākakiriyacittesu
tika-abh09t:1893_7: vitthārato yathānurūpaṃ paccayākāro vibhatto. Idañca yasmā na kevalaṃ ayaṃ paccayākāro
tika-abh09t:1893_8: nānācittesu eva hoti, ekacittepi hotiyeva. Nāpi vaṭṭacitte eva hoti, taṇhābhāvato
tika-abh09t:1893_9: vivaṭṭacittepi, tasmā taṃ nippadesato ekacittakkhaṇikaṃ paccayākāraṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh09t:1893_10: Teneva hettha “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”ti avatvā “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhāro”ti ekavacanena
tika-abh09t:1893_11: vuttaṃ ekacittakkhaṇe bahucetanābhāvā. Tattha yadetaṃ paṭhamacatukkaṃ, tattha paṭhamavāro
tika-abh09t:1893_12: nāmarūpaṭṭhāne nāmaṃ, saḷāyatanaṭṭhāne chaṭṭhāyatanañca gahetvā rūpārūpādisabbabhavasādhāraṇavasena,
tika-abh09t:1893_13: ekacittakkhaṇapariyāpannadhammaggahaṇavasena ca rūpaṃ chaḍḍetvā vutto rūpassa sabbabhavāsādhāraṇattā,
tika-abh09t:1893_14: bahucittakkhaṇikattā ca. Dutiyo nāmarūpaṭṭhāne nāmaṃ, “nāmapaccayā phasso”ti saḷāyatanaṭṭhāne
tika-abh09t:1893_15: phassameva gahetvā phassassa saḷāyatanaṃ vināpi paccayavisesasambhavadassanavasena
tika-abh09t:1893_16: ceva mahānidānasuttanayadassanavasena ca vutto. Tatiyo saḷāyatanaṭṭhāne chaṭṭhāyatanameva
tika-abh09t:1893_17: gahetvā gabbhaseyyakānaṃ aparipuṇṇāyatanānaṃ, rūpabhavikādīnañca vasena vutto. Catuttho
tika-abh09t:1893_18: “nāmapaccayā saḷāyatanaṃ, saḷāyatanapaccayā phasso”ti evaṃ itarāyatanehipi saḷāyatanassa
tika-abh09t:1893_19: visesato phassapaccayataṃva dassetvā opapātikānaṃ, paripuṇṇāyatanānaṃ kāmabhavikānañca
tika-abh09t:1894_0: Sabbatthāpi cettha yasmā sokādayo sabbe ekacittakkhaṇe na sambhavanti, sabbasmiñca
tika-abh09t:1894_1: citte, bhave ca nappavattanti, tasmā na gahitā. Jātijarāmaraṇāni panettha arūpadhammānaṃ
tika-abh09t:1894_2: lakkhaṇamattāni, tāni ca acittakkhaṇamattānipi samānāni cittakkhaṇe antogadhattā
tika-abh09t:1894_3: pariyāyato paccayuppanne katvā aṅgaparipūraṇatthaṃ gahitāni. Bhavoti cettha upādānādipaccayavirahitā
tika-abh09t:1894_4: cattāro arūpino khandhā, taṇhāpaccayā upādānanti ettha kāmupādānaṃ vajjetvā tīṇi
tika-abh09t:1894_5: upādānāni eva gahetabbāni. Dvinnampi ekalakkhaṇānaṃ dhammānaṃ ekakkhaṇe asambhavā
tika-abh09t:1894_6: lobhamūlavirahitesu dosamohamūlesu ceva kusalābyākatesu ca cittesu vedanāpaccayā
tika-abh09t:1894_7: paṭighaṃ vicikicchā uddhaccanti evaṃ taṇhāṭhāne yathāyogaṃ paṭighādayo tayo. Tesu
tika-abh09t:1894_8: vicikicchāvajjitesu ceva diṭṭhivippayuttesu ca upādānaṭṭhāne adhimokkho gahito. Vicikicchāya
tika-abh09t:1894_9: pana saddhiṃ adhimokkhassāpi asambhavā vicikicchāpaccayā bhavoti ca gahito. Upādānaṭṭhāne
tika-abh09t:1894_10: ca adhimokkho ca gahito. Lokiyānañcettha kusalābyākatānaṃ upanissayavasena avijjāpaccayatā
tika-abh09t:1894_11: vuttā. Lokuttarānaṃ pana yasmā appahīnāvijjo avijjāya pahānatthaṃ, paṭippassambhanatthañca
tika-abh09t:1894_12: lokuttaraṃ bhāveti, tasmā samatikkamanavasena avijjāpaccayatā vuttā, na sahajātavasena.
tika-abh09t:1894_13: Teneva tesaṃ niddesavāresu “tattha katamā avijjā”ti avibhajitvā “tattha katamo avijjāpaccayā
tika-abh09t:1894_14: saṅkhāro”ti vibhattaṃ. Kiriyadhammānaṃ pana kenaci pariyāyena avijjāmūlakattaṃ natthīti
tika-abh09t:1894_15: “saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇa”ntiādinā saṅkhāramūlakādiko nayo vutto, na avijjāmūlako.
tika-abh09t:1894_16: Apica lokiyakusalādīsu tesaṃ dhammānaṃ dukkhasaccapariyāpannattā “evametassa kevalassa
tika-abh09t:1894_17: dukkhakkhandhassa samudayo hotī”ti evaṃ appanā katā, lokuttarakusalādīsu “evametesaṃ
tika-abh09t:1894_18: dhammāna”nti. Ayaṃ lokiyato lokuttarānaṃ desanāya visesoti ayaṃ abhidhammabhājanīye nayo.
tika-abh09t:1899_0: Tattha paccayanayo sāmaññato, visesato cāti duvidho hoti. Tattha tabbhāvabhāvimattatāpakāsako
tika-abh09t:1899_1: sāmaññato paccayanayo. Visesato pana paṭṭhāne āgatesu hetupaccayādicatuvīsatiyā paccayesu
tika-abh09t:1899_2: yathānurūpaṃ paccayavisesuppannamattatāpakāsako. Sā ca nesaṃ catuvīsatiyā paccayānaṃ
tika-abh09t:1899_3: vibhāgatā paṭṭhānamātikatthasaṃvaṇṇanāya āvi bhavissati. Tattha sāmaññato saṅkhārādayo
tika-abh09t:1899_4: avijjādipaccayabhāve eva bhāvinoti veditabbā. Yassa hi catūsu saccesu, pubbantādīsu
tika-abh09t:1899_5: ca avijjā appahīnā hoti, so dukkhe tāva pubbantādīsu ca aññāṇena tīsu bhavesu jātijarārogamaraṇādianekādīnavavokiṇṇaṃ
tika-abh09t:1899_6: puññaphalasaṅkhātaṃ saṅkhāravipariṇāmadukkhaṃ dukkhato ajānanto sukhasaññāya patthetvā
tika-abh09t:1899_7: tīhi dvārehi puññāneñjābhisaṅkhāre ārabhati. Samudaye aññāṇena dukkhahetubhūtesupi
tika-abh09t:1899_9: ca ādīnavaṃ apassanto sukhahetusaññāya ceva kilesābhibhūtatāya ca tividhepi saṅkhāre
tika-abh09t:1899_10: ārabhati. Nirodhe, pana magge ca aññāṇena anirodhabhūte gativisese nirodhasaññī,
tika-abh09t:1899_11: nirodhassa ca vā amaggabhūtesupi yaññāmaratapādīsupi nirodhamaggasaññī hutvā tividhepi
tika-abh09t:1899_12: saṅkhāre ārabhati. Idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu aññāṇena “ahetū appaccayā
tika-abh09t:1899_13: sattā uppajjanti, na honti paraṃ maraṇā”ti vā “attāva jānāti vā na jānāti vā, sova
tika-abh09t:1899_14: saṅkhāre saṅkharoti, sova paṭisandhiyaṃ uppajjati, tassa aṇuissarādayo kalalādibhāvena
tika-abh09t:1899_15: sarīraṃ saṇṭhāpentā indriyāni sampādenti, sova indriyasampanno phusati, vedayati,
tika-abh09t:1899_16: taṇhiyati, upādānādīni ca karotī”ti vā “sabbe sattā niyatisaṅgatibhavapariṇatā”ti
tika-abh09t:1899_17: vā vikappeti. So evaṃ avijjāya andhīkato –
tika-abh09t:1904_0: Vuttanayena tividhe saṅkhāre abhisaṅkharotīti. Kiṃ panettha ekāva avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ
tika-abh09t:1904_1: paccayo hoti, nanu ekasmā kāraṇā ekaṃva kāriyaṃ uppajjati, anekaṃ kāriyaṃ na uppajjati,
tika-abh09t:1904_2: anekasmā vā ekanti, anekasmā kāraṇā anekaṃ kāriyaṃ uppajjatīti? Saccaṃ, padhānattapākaṭattaasādhāraṇattadīpanatthaṃ
tika-abh09t:1904_3: panettha anekesu kāraṇesupi ekā avijjā eva paccayabhāvena niddiṭṭhā “phassapaccayā
tika-abh09t:1904_4: vedanā, semhasamuṭṭhānā ābādhā”tiādīsu viya. Avijjā hi padhāno hetu, saṅkhārānaṃ
tika-abh09t:1904_5: pākaṭo, asādhāraṇo ca taṇhādihetūnampi hetuttā, na vatthārammaṇādīni khīṇāsavassa
tika-abh09t:1904_6: tesaṃ sambhavepi saṅkhārānaṃ abhāvāti. Evaṃ tāvettha vaṭṭasaṅkhārānaṃ avijjāya eva
tika-abh09t:1904_7: bhāve bhāvo veditabbo. Tathā viññāṇassāpi upacitakammābhāve abhāvato, sabbattha sabbesañca
tika-abh09t:1904_8: sabbavipākaviññāṇuppattippasaṅgato ca saṅkhārānaṃ eva bhāve bhāvo veditabbo. Yathā
tika-abh09t:1904_9: cettha, evaṃ uparipi nāmarūpādīnaṃ viññāṇādibhāve bhāvo yathānurūpaṃ anubhavayuttīhi
tika-abh09t:1905_0: Visesato pana avijjā puññābhisaṅkhārānaṃ tāva ārammaṇapaccayena, upanissayapaccayena
tika-abh09t:1905_1: cāti dvidhā paccayo hoti. Sā hi avijjaṃ ārabbha sammasanādivasena uppattiyaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ,
tika-abh09t:1905_2: abhiññācittena samohacittassa jānanakāle rūpāvacarānañca puññābhisaṅkhārānaṃ tāva
tika-abh09t:1905_3: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo hoti, avijjāsamatikkamanatthāya pana avijjāsammūḷhatāya
tika-abh09t:1905_5: paccayo hoti. Apuññābhisaṅkhārānaṃ panesā avijjaṃ ārabbha rāgādīnaṃ uppajjanakāle
tika-abh09t:1905_9: paccayo hoti, āneñjābhisaṅkhārānaṃ pana ekena upanissayapaccayeneva paccayo hoti.
tika-abh09t:1906_0: Saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇapade pana tayopi saṅkhārā viññāṇassa yathārahaṃ tīsu bhavesu
tika-abh09t:1906_1: paṭisandhipavattīsu kammapaccayena ceva upanissayapaccayena cāti dvidhā paccayā honti.
tika-abh09t:1907_0: Viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpapade pana viññāṇaṃ vipākabhūtaṃ, avipākabhūtañca nāmassa kevalassa
tika-abh09t:1907_2: yathārahaṃ navadhā, aṭṭhadhā vā paccayo hoti. Paṭisandhiyaṃ vipākaviññāṇaṃ vatthurūpassa
tika-abh09t:1907_4: paccayo hoti. Ṭhapetvā pana vatthurūpaṃ sesarūpassa teheva aññamaññapaccayarahitehi
tika-abh09t:1907_5: aṭṭhahi paccayo hoti. Abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇaṃ pana ekavokārapañcavokārabhavesu kammajarūpassa
tika-abh09t:1907_6: suttantikapariyāyena upanissayavasena paccayo hoti. Pavattiyaṃ pana sabbampi viññāṇaṃ
tika-abh09t:1907_7: tassa tassa nāmarūpassa yathārahaṃ paccayo hoti. Tattha arūpabhave viññāṇaṃ nāmasseva,
tika-abh09t:1907_8: asaññibhave rūpasseva, pañcavokārabhave nāmarūpassa paccayo hotīti veditabbaṃ. Teneva
tika-abh09t:1907_9: nāmañca rūpañca nāmarūpañca nāmarūpanti nibbacanaṃ katanti.
tika-abh09t:1908_0: Nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanapade pana nāmaṃ vipākabhūtaṃ, avipākabhūtañca arūpabhave
tika-abh09t:1908_2: yathārahaṃ sattadhā paccayo hoti. Itaresaṃ panetaṃ pañcannaṃ cakkhāyatanādīnaṃ pañcavokārabhave
tika-abh09t:1908_4: chadhā paccayo hoti. Kiñci panettha hetupaccayena, kiñci āhārapaccayena cāti tesaṃ
tika-abh09t:1908_5: vasena sabbavāresu ukkaṃsāvakaṃso veditabbo. Pavatte pana cakkhādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ vipākamavipākampi
tika-abh09t:1908_6: nāmaṃ pacchājātavippayuttaatthiavigatavasena catudhā paccayo hotīti. Evaṃ tāva nāmameva
tika-abh09t:1909_1: chadhā paccayo hoti. Catumahābhūtarūpaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ, pavatte
tika-abh09t:1909_2: ca sahajātanissayaatthiavigatapaccayehi catudhā paccayo hoti. Rūpajīvitindriyaṃ pana
tika-abh09t:1909_3: indriyaatthiavigatavasena tividhā. Tathā āhāro āhāratthiavigatavasena. So ca āhārūpajīvīnaṃ
tika-abh09t:1909_4: pavatteyeva, no paṭisandhiyaṃ. Tāni pana pañca cakkhāyatanādīni pañcaviññāṇasaṅkhātassa
tika-abh09t:1909_6: paccayā honti pavatteyeva, no paṭisandhiyaṃ. Tathā pañcaviññāṇavirahitamanāyatanassa
tika-abh09t:1909_8: Evaṃ rūpameva chaṭṭhāyatanassa, saḷāyatanassa ca paccayo hotīti veditabbaṃ. Khandhattayavatthurūpasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-abh09t:1909_10: yathārahaṃ paccayo hotīti. Evaṃ nāmañca rūpañca nāmarūpañca yathārahaṃ chaṭṭhāyatanassa,
tika-abh09t:1910_0: Saḷāyatanapaccayā phassapade pana chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ vipākaṃ, avipākañca sabbattha sampayuttaphassassa
tika-abh09t:1910_1: sahajātādivasena navadhā, aṭṭhadhā vā paccayo hoti. Cakkhāyatanādīni pañca yathākkamaṃ
tika-abh09t:1910_3: chadhā, rūpāyatanādīni pañca tesaṃ ārammaṇapurejātaatthiavigatavasena tidhā. Manosamphassassa
tika-abh09t:1910_4: pana tāni, dhammārammaṇañca tathā ca ārammaṇādhipatimattena cāti bahudhā paccayā
tika-abh09t:1910_5: honti. Evaṃ chaṭṭhāyatanañca saḷāyatanañca chabbidhassāpi phassassa paccayo hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh09t:1911_0: Phassapaccayā vedanāpade sabbopi phasso sahajātānaṃ vedanānaṃ sahajātaaññamaññanissayavipākaāhārasampayuttaatthiavigatavasena
tika-abh09t:1911_1: aṭṭhadhā, sattadhā vā paccayo hoti, asahajātānaṃ upanissayavasenevāti.
tika-abh09t:1912: Vedanāpaccayā taṇhāpade vipākavedanā anusayapatitāya taṇhāya upanissayavasena, sahajātādivasena ca paccayo hoti. Yasmā pana –
tika-abh09t:1913: Dukkhī sukhaṃ patthayati, sukhī bhiyyopi icchati;
tika-abh09t:1915: Taṇhāya paccayā tasmā, honti tissopi vedanāti. ;
tika-abh09t:1916_0: Taṇhāpaccayā upādānapade taṇhā asahajātā catunnampi upādānānaṃ upanissayavasena ceva
tika-abh09t:1916_1: anantarādivasena ca, sahajātā pana kāmupādānavajjitānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ hetusahajāta aññamaññanissayasampayuttaatthiavigatavasena
tika-abh09t:1917_0: Upādānapaccayā bhavapade catubbidhampi upādānaṃ asahajātassa sabbakammabhavassa ceva
tika-abh09t:1917_1: upapattibhavassa ca upanissayavaseneva paccayo hoti, sahajātassa pana kammabhavassa
tika-abh09t:1918: Bhavapaccayā jātipade bhavoti kammabhavova adhippeto, so ca jātiyā kammapaccayaupanissayapaccayavasena dvidhā paccayo hoti.
tika-abh09t:1919: Jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇādipade jāti pana jarāmaraṇānaṃ, sokādīnañca tabbhāvabhāvībhāvamattato suttantikanayena upanissayakoṭiyāva paccayo hotīti ayaṃ tāvettha paccayanayo.
tika-abh09t:1920_0: Kārakādīhi suññato panete avijjādayo dvādasa dhammā yasmā evaṃ paccayapaccayuppannabhāvena
tika-abh09t:1920_1: aññamaññaṃ paṭibaddhā aññanirapekkhā hutvā avicchinnā anādikā pavattanti, tasmā tato
tika-abh09t:1920_2: aññena brahmādinā kārakena, pakatiaṇukālādihetunā vā kārakavedakarūpena paraparikappitena
tika-abh09t:1920_3: attanā vā rahitā. Na cete attā, na attani, na attavanto, suññā ete attena vā attaniyena
tika-abh09t:1920_4: vā dhuvabhāvena vā subhabhāvena vā sukhabhāvena vāti ayaṃ kārakādīhi suññatā.
tika-abh09t:1921_0: Mūladdhasandhisaṅkhepākāravaṭṭavibhāgatoti ettha mūlato tāva avijjā, taṇhā cāti dve
tika-abh09t:1921_1: dhammā mūlanti veditabbā. Addhato panettha avijjā, saṅkhārāti dve aṅgāni atīto addhā,
tika-abh09t:1921_2: viññāṇādīni bhavāvasānāni aṭṭha paccuppanno addhā, jāti ceva jarāmaraṇañcāti dve
tika-abh09t:1921_3: anāgato addhāti tayo addhā veditabbā. Sandhito pana saṅkhārānaṃ, paṭisandhiviññāṇassa
tika-abh09t:1921_4: ca antarā eko hetuphalasandhi, vedanāya ca taṇhāya ca antarā eko phalahetusandhi,
tika-abh09t:1921_5: bhavassa ca jātiyā ca antarā eko hetuphalasandhi cāti tayo sandhī veditabbā. Saṅkhepato
tika-abh09t:1921_6: pana sandhīnaṃ ādipariyosānavavatthitā cattāro saṅkhepā honti. Seyyathidaṃ – avijjāsaṅkhārā
tika-abh09t:1921_7: eko saṅkhepo, viññāṇanāmarūpasaḷāyatanaphassavedanā dutiyo, taṇhupādānabhavā tatiyo,
tika-abh09t:1921_8: jātijarāmaraṇāni catutthoti evaṃ cattāro saṅkhepā veditabbā.
tika-abh09t:1926_0: Ettha hi sarūpato vuttā avijjāsaṅkhārā, tesaṃ gahaṇena tadavinābhāvato gahitā taṇhupādānabhavāti
tika-abh09t:1926_1: ime pañca dhammā atīte hetuyo nāma, sarūpato vuttā viññāṇādayo pañca dhammā idāni
tika-abh09t:1926_2: phalapañcakaṃ nāma, sarūpato pana vuttā taṇhupādānabhavā, tesaṃ gahaṇena tadavinābhāvato
tika-abh09t:1926_3: gahitā avijjāsaṅkhārāti ime pañca idāni hetuyo nāma. Jātiādiapadesena vuttā viññāṇādayo
tika-abh09t:1926_4: pañca dhammā āyatiṃ phalapañcakaṃ nāmāti evaṃ vīsati ākārā veditabbā. Vaṭṭato panettha
tika-abh09t:1926_5: saṅkhārabhavā kammavaṭṭaṃ, avijjātaṇhupādānā kilesavaṭṭaṃ, sesāni vipākavaṭṭanti
tika-abh09t:1926_6: tīṇi vaṭṭāni honti. Yāva ca tesu kilesavaṭṭaṃ ariyamaggena na upacchijjati, tāva
tika-abh09t:1926_7: idaṃ bhavacakkaṃ anupacchinnaṃ pavattatīti ayamettha mūladdhasandhisaṅkhepākāravaṭṭavibhāgo.
tika-abh09t:1927_0: Vāraṇopamatoti ettha vāraṇato tāva – “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”ti idamahetukavisamahetukadassananivāraṇaṃ,
tika-abh09t:1927_3: saḷāyatana”ntiādi attā passati…pe… vijānāti phusati, vedayati, taṇhiyati, upādiyati,
tika-abh09t:1927_4: bhavati, jāyati, jīyati, mīyatīti evamādidassananivāraṇanti idamettha micchādassananivāraṇaṃ.
tika-abh09t:1928_0: Upamāto panettha andho viya avijjā, tassa upakkhalanaṃ viya saṅkhārā, patanaṃ viya
tika-abh09t:1928_1: viññāṇaṃ, tena gaṇḍapātubhāvo viya nāmarūpaṃ, tassa gaṇḍabhedapīḷakā viya saḷāyatanaṃ,
tika-abh09t:1928_2: tassa saṅghaṭṭanaṃ viya phasso, tajjanitadukkhaṃ viya vedanā, dukkhassa paṭikārābhilāso
tika-abh09t:1928_3: viya taṇhā, asappāyaggahaṇaṃ viya upādānaṃ, asappāyālepanaṃ viya bhavo, tena gaṇḍavikārapātubhāvo
tika-abh09t:1928_4: viya jāti, tabbikārabhedo viya jarāmaraṇaṃ. Yathāsabhāvadassananivāraṇādito vā ete
tika-abh09t:1928_5: avijjādayo akkhipaṭalādi upamāhipi veditabbāti ayamettha upamā.
tika-abh09t:1929_0: Gambhīranayabhedatoti ettha gambhīrabhedo tāva imesaṃ avijjādīnaṃ paccekaṃ dhammatthadesanāpaṭivedhagambhīratā
tika-abh09t:1929_1: veditabbā. Ime hi avijjādayo dhammā yenākārena yadavatthā ca saṅkhārādīnaṃ phalānaṃ
tika-abh09t:1929_2: paccayā honti, so nesaṃ paccayaṭṭho duravabodhato gambhīroti ayamettha dhammagambhīratā.
tika-abh09t:1929_3: Dhammoti hetu “hetumhi ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā”ti vacanato. Jarāmaraṇādīnaṃ phalānaṃ
tika-abh09t:1929_4: jātiādīhi paccayehi sambhūtasamudāgataṭṭho duravabodhato gambhīroti ayaṃ atthagambhīratā.
tika-abh09t:1929_5: Atthoti phalaṃ “hetuphale ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā”ti vacanato. Tesaṃ pana hetūnaṃ,
tika-abh09t:1929_6: phalānañca tena tenākārena aviparītato desanāpi sabbaññutaññāṇasseva gocarato gambhīrāti
tika-abh09t:1929_7: ayaṃ desanāgambhīratā. Yo panesaṃ avijjāsaṅkhārādīnaṃ adassanāyūhanādisabhāvo, so
tika-abh09t:1929_8: mandapaññehi duppariyogāhattā gambhīroti ayaṃ paṭivedhagambhīratāti ayamettha gambhīrabhedo.
tika-abh09t:1930_0: Nayabhedo panettha ekattanayo nānattanayo abyāpāranayo evaṃdhammatānayoti imesaṃ
tika-abh09t:1930_1: catunnaṃ atthanayānaṃ vasena veditabbo. Tattha hi “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā, saṅkhārapaccayā
tika-abh09t:1930_2: viññāṇa”nti evaṃ bījassa aṅkurādibhāvena rukkhabhāvappatti viya santānānupacchedo
tika-abh09t:1930_3: ekattanayo nāma. Yaṃ sammā passanto hetuphalasambandhena santānānupacchedāvabodhato
tika-abh09t:1930_4: ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ pajahati, micchā passanto hetuphalasambandhena pavattamānassa santānānupacchedassa
tika-abh09t:1931_0: Avijjādīnaṃ pana yathāsakaṃ lakkhaṇavavatthānaṃ nānattanayo nāma. Yaṃ sammā passanto
tika-abh09t:1931_1: navanavānaṃ uppādadassanato sassatadiṭṭhiṃ pajahati, micchā passanto ekasantānapatitassa
tika-abh09t:1932_0: Avijjāya pana “saṅkhārā mayā uppādetabbā, saṅkhārānaṃ vā viññāṇaṃ amhehī”ti evamādibyāpārābhāvo
tika-abh09t:1932_1: abyāpāranayo nāma. Yaṃ sammā passantokārakassa abhāvāvabodhato attadiṭṭhiṃ pajahati,
tika-abh09t:1932_2: micchā passanto yo asatipi byāpāre avijjādīnaṃ sabhāvaniyamasiddho hetubhāvo, tassa
tika-abh09t:1933_0: Avijjādīhi pana kāraṇehi saṅkhārādīnaṃyeva sambhavo khīrādīhi dadhiādīnaṃ viya, na
tika-abh09t:1933_1: aññesanti ayaṃ evaṃdhammatānayo nāma. Yaṃ sammā passanto paccayānurūpato phalāvabodhato
tika-abh09t:1933_2: ahetukadiṭṭhiṃ, akiriyadiṭṭhiñca pajahati, micchā passanto paccayānurūpaṃ phalappavattiṃ
tika-abh09t:1933_3: aggahetvā yato kutoci yassa kassaci asambhavaggahaṇato ahetukadiṭṭhiṃ ceva niyatavādañca
tika-abh09t:1933_4: upādiyatīti ayamettha nayabhedoti evaṃ vijānīyo pāḷimuttavinicchayo.
tika-abh09t:1936_0: Satipaṭṭhānavibhaṅgamātikāya pana atthato tāva – cattāroti gaṇanaparicchedo, tena
tika-abh09t:1936_1: na tato heṭṭhā, na uddhanti dīpeti. Satipaṭṭhānāti ettha dve satipaṭṭhānā satigocaropi
tika-abh09t:1936_2: satipi. “Catunnaṃ, bhikkhave, satipaṭṭhānānaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca desessāmī”tiādīsu
tika-abh09t:1936_3: hi satigocaro “satipaṭṭhāna”nti vuccati, tassattho patiṭṭhāti tasminti paṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-abh09t:1936_4: kā patiṭṭhāti? Sati. Satiyā paṭṭhānaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ. Padhānaṃ ṭhānanti vā paṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-abh09t:1936_5: satiyā paṭṭhānaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ. “Cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā satta bojjhaṅge
tika-abh09t:1936_6: paripūrentī”tiādīsu pana sati. Tassattho patiṭṭhātīti paṭṭhānaṃ, upaṭṭhāti okkantitvā
tika-abh09t:1936_7: pakkhanditvā pavattatīti attho. Satiyeva paṭṭhānatthena satipaṭṭhānaṃ. Atha vā saraṇaṭṭhena
tika-abh09t:1936_8: sati, sā ca upaṭṭhānaṭṭhena paṭṭhānanti satipaṭṭhānaṃ, idamidha adhippetaṃ. Yadi
tika-abh09t:1936_9: evaṃ, kasmā satipaṭṭhānāti bahuvacanaṃ kataṃ? Satiyā bahuttā. Ārammaṇabhedena hi bahukā tā satiyo.
tika-abh09t:1937_1: puggalassa nissayabhūtaṃ sāsanameva, nāññaṃ sāsananti dīpeti. Vuttaṃ hetaṃ “idheva,
tika-abh09t:1937_2: bhikkhave, samaṇo…pe… suññā parappavādā samaṇehi aññehī”ti.
tika-abh09t:1938_0: Bhikkhūti saṃsāre bhayaṃ ikkhanako. Tena kiñcāpi bhagavato devaloke nisīditvā satipaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh09t:1938_1: desentassa santike devagaṇaṃ muñcitvā ekabhikkhupi nisinno nāma natthi, tathāpi devo
tika-abh09t:1938_2: vā hotu manusso vā gahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā, saṃsāre bhayanti sammā ikkhamāno yathānusiṭṭhaṃ
tika-abh09t:1938_3: paṭipajjamānova bhikkhu nāma hoti, nāññoti dasseti. Yathāha “alaṅkato cepī”ti.
tika-abh09t:1939_0: Ajjhattanti niyakajjhattaṃ. Kāyeti ettha āyanti tatoti āyo. Ke āyanti? Kucchitā kesādayo,
tika-abh09t:1939_1: iti kucchitānaṃ āyoti kāyo. Atha vā aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ, kesādīnañca samūhaṭṭhenapi kāyo,
tika-abh09t:1939_2: rūpakāyo, tasmiṃ attano kāyeti attho. Kāyānupassīti kāyaṃ anupassanasīlo. “Kāye”ti
tika-abh09t:1939_3: ca vatvā puna “kāyānupassī”ti dutiyakāya-ggahaṇaṃ “evaṃ na kāye aṅgapaccaṅgavinimuttaekadhammānupassī,
tika-abh09t:1939_7: yathāvuttadhammasamūhavinimutto itthipurisādiko, añño vā koci dhammo na dissati,
tika-abh09t:1939_8: yathāvuttadhammasamūhamatteyeva pana bālā tathā tathā subhādito ca micchābhinivesaṃ
tika-abh09t:1939_9: karonti, ayaṃ pana yogī tattha kāyānupassī eva aniccadukkhaanattāsubhānupassī evāti
tika-abh09t:1939_10: vuttaṃ hoti. Atha vā yvāyaṃ mahāsatipaṭṭhāne assāsapassāsādiko cuddasavidho kāyo
tika-abh09t:1939_11: vutto, tassa sabbassa imasmiṃyeva kāye anupassanato “kāye kāyānupassī”ti evamādināpi attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh09t:1940_0: Viharatīti iriyati, catūsu iriyāpathesu ekenāgataṃ sarīrabādhanaṃ aññena iriyāpathena
tika-abh09t:1940_1: vicchinditvā apatamānaṃ attabhāvaṃ harati, pavattetīti attho. Bahiddhā kāyeti parassa
tika-abh09t:1940_2: kāye. Ajjhattabahiddhā kāyeti kālena attano, kālena parassa kāye. Kālena hi ajjhattabahiddhākāyesupi
tika-abh09t:1940_3: ekasmiṃ khaṇe kāyānupassanā uppajjati, paguṇakammaṭṭhānassa pana aparāparaṃ sañcaraṇakālo
tika-abh09t:1940_4: ettha kathito. Ātāpīti kāyapariggāhakavīriyena vīriyavā. So hi yasmā kilesānaṃ ātāpanato
tika-abh09t:1940_5: ātāpo vuccati vīriyaṃ, so cassa atthi, tasmā ātāpīti vuccati. Sampajānoti kāyapariggāhakena
tika-abh09t:1940_6: sampajaññena samannāgato. Satimāti kāyapariggāhikāya satiyā samannāgato. Ayaṃ pana
tika-abh09t:1940_7: yasmā satiyā ārammaṇaṃ pariggahetvā paññāya anupassati, vīriyena ca antarā vosānaṃ
tika-abh09t:1940_8: nāpajjati, tasmā yesaṃ dhammānaṃ ānubhāvena taṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ sampajjati, tesaṃ dassanatthaṃ
tika-abh09t:1941_0: Iti kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ, sampayogaṅgañca dassetvā idāni pahānaṅgaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-abh09t:1941_1: “vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassa”nti vuttaṃ. Tattha vineyyāti tadaṅgavinayena vā vikkhambhanavinayena
tika-abh09t:1941_2: vā vinayitvā. Loketi yvāyaṃ ajjhattādibhedo kāyo vutto, sveva idha lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena
tika-abh09t:1941_3: loko nāma. Vibhaṅge pana yasmā rūpakāye pahīnaabhijjhādayo vedanādīsupi pahīyanti
tika-abh09t:1941_4: eva, tasmā pañcapi upādānakkhandhā “loko”ti vuttaṃ. Tasmiṃ loke abhijjhādomanassasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-abh09t:1941_5: kāmacchandabyāpādaṃ vineyyāti sambandho. Imassa ca nīvaraṇesu balavadhammadvayassa
tika-abh09t:1941_6: pahānadassanena sesanīvaraṇānampi pahānaṃ vuttaṃyevāti veditabbaṃ. Visesena cettha
tika-abh09t:1941_9: pahānaṃ vuttaṃ, tena yogāvacarassa yogānubhāvanibbattaphalaṃ, yogasamatthatā ca dīpitā hoti.
tika-abh09t:1942_0: Ajjhattaṃ vedanāsūtiādīsupi ajjhattādīni vuttanayena veditabbāni. Ettha pana vedanāti
tika-abh09t:1942_1: tisso vedanā lokiyā, tathā cittaṃ, dhammā ca, tesaṃ vibhāgo vibhaṅganaye āvi bhavissati.
tika-abh09t:1942_2: Kevalaṃ panettha yathā vedanādayo anupassanto vedanādianupassī nāma hoti, so nayo
tika-abh09t:1942_3: dassetabbo. Seyyathidaṃ – vedanāsu tāva sukhā vedanā dukkhato, dukkhā sallato, itarā
tika-abh09t:1945_0: Sabbā eva etā dukkhato anupassitabbā “yaṃ kiñci vedayitaṃ, taṃ dukkhasminti vadāmī”ti
tika-abh09t:1945_1: vacanato. Evaṃ anupassanto pana aniccādisattānupassanāvasena vā anupassantopi “imaṃ
tika-abh09t:1945_2: vedanaṃ ko vedayati, kassāyaṃ vedanā, kiṃ kāraṇāyaṃ vedanā”ti upaparikkhitvā “na
tika-abh09t:1945_3: koci sattādiko vedayati, na kesañci sattādīnaṃ vedanā, vatthārammaṇādikāraṇā panāyaṃ
tika-abh09t:1945_4: vedanā uppajjatī”ti anupassantopi vedanānupassī nāma hoti. Atha vā sukhādīnaṃ uppattikkhaṇe
tika-abh09t:1945_5: dukkhādīnaṃ asambhavā aniccā addhuvā vipariṇāmadhammāti evaṃ vā anupassanto vedanānupassī
tika-abh09t:1945_6: nāma hoti. Imināva nayena pāḷinayānusārena sesacittadhammānampi anupassanākāro veditabbo.
tika-abh09t:1945_7: Visesato panettha cittesu aniccatāvasena, dhammesu anattatāvasena ca anupassanto
tika-abh09t:1945_8: cittānupassī, dhammānupassī ca nāma hotīti veditabbaṃ. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva. Ayaṃ tāvettha padattho.
tika-abh09t:1946: Dhammabhedo panettha natthi, saraṇavasena ca ekāva sati ārammaṇavasena “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”ti vuttāti.
tika-abh09t:1947_0: Vibhaṅganayato panettha suttantabhājanīye tāva ajjhattabahiddhātadubhayakāye kesādikoṭṭhāsabhāvanāvasena
tika-abh09t:1947_1: paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ vitthāritaṃ. Tathā ajjhattādīsu paccekaṃ sāmisanirāmisavasena
tika-abh09t:1948_0: Abhidhammabhājanīye pana tāva “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā. Idha bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī
tika-abh09t:1948_1: viharati vedanāsu…pe… dhammesu dhammānupassī viharatī”ti evaṃ mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ
tika-abh09t:1948_2: vuttanayassa vitthāresu aṭṭhasu lokuttaracittesu sampayuttasativaseneva vitthārato vibhattā.
tika-abh09t:1949_0: Pañhāpucchakanayepi catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānaṃ kati kusalā…pe… kati araṇā? Siyā kusalā,
tika-abh09t:1949_2: Na hetū ahetukāva…pe… anuttarā araṇāvāti lokuttaravaseneva vibhattā. Sammāsambuddhena
tika-abh09t:1949_3: hi suttantabhājanīyasmiññeva lokiyalokuttaramissakā satipaṭṭhānā kathitā, abhidhammabhājanīyapañhāpucchakesu
tika-abh09t:1949_4: pana lokuttarāyeva. Tesu ca lokiyā nānācittesu eva labbhanti. Aññeneva hi cittena
tika-abh09t:1949_5: kāyaṃ paggaṇhanti, aññena vedanādayoti. Lokuttarā pana cattāropi maggakkhaṇe ekacitteyeva
tika-abh09t:1949_6: labbhanti. Ekasmiñhi maggacittakkhaṇe ārammaṇato nibbānārammaṇā ekāva sati kāyādīsu
tika-abh09t:1952_0: Tattha kamato tāva ayampi desanākkamova, sopi pākaṭāpākaṭavasena vutto. Imāsu hi
tika-abh09t:1952_1: rūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ pākaṭanti paṭhamaṃ kāyānupassanā vuttā. Tato arūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-abh09t:1952_2: Tatthāpi ārammaṇaṃ anubhavantī uppajjamānā vedanā pākaṭāti anantarā vedanānupassanā,
tika-abh09t:1952_3: tato ārammaṇaṃ vijānantaṃ viññāṇaṃ pākaṭanti cittānupassanā, citte pākaṭe tannissitā
tika-abh09t:1952_4: sukhumāpi dhammā pākaṭā hontīti ante dhammānupassanā vuttā. Ayaṃ tāvettha kamo.
tika-abh09t:1953_0: Anūnādhikatoti ettha pana kasmā bhagavatā cattārova satipaṭṭhānā vuttā, anūnā anadhikāti?
tika-abh09t:1953_2: visuddhimaggavasena. Mandassa hi taṇhācaritassa oḷārikaṃ kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh09t:1953_5: dhammānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ visuddhimaggo. Samathayānikassa ca mandassa akicchena
tika-abh09t:1953_6: adhigantabbanimittaṃ paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ visuddhimaggo, tikkhassa dutiyaṃ, vipassanāyānikassāpi
tika-abh09t:1953_7: mandassa tatiyaṃ, tikkhassa catutthaṃ visuddhimaggoti veneyyajjhāsayato cattāro vuttā.
tika-abh09t:1953_9: catubbidhāhārapariññatthañca cattārova vuttā, anūnā anadhikāti ayamettha anūnādhikatā.
tika-abh09t:1956_0: Sammappadhānavibhaṅgamātikāya pana atthato tāva – sammappadhānāti kāraṇappadhānā
tika-abh09t:1956_1: upāyappadhānā. Yoniso padahanato paramaṃ dhānaṃ padhānaṃ, padhānavīriyānīti attho.
tika-abh09t:1956_2: Idha bhikkhūti imasmiṃ sāsane paṭipannako bhikkhu. Anuppannānanti anibbattānaṃ. Pāpakānanti
tika-abh09t:1956_3: lāmakānaṃ. Akusalānaṃ dhammānanti akosallasambhūtānaṃ dhammānaṃ. Anuppādāyāti na
tika-abh09t:1956_4: uppādanatthāya. Chandaṃ janetīti kattukamyatāsaṅkhātaṃ kusalacchandaṃ janeti uppādeti.
tika-abh09t:1956_5: Vāyamatīti payogaṃ parakkamaṃ karoti. Vīriyaṃ ārabhatīti kāyikacetasikavīriyaṃ karoti.
tika-abh09t:1956_6: Cittaṃ paggaṇhātīti teneva sahajātavīriyena cittaṃ ukkhipati. Padahatīti padhānavīriyaṃ
tika-abh09t:1956_7: karoti. Paṭipāṭiyā panetāni cattāripi padāni vīriyasseva āsevanābhāvanābahulīkammasātaccakiriyāhi yojetabbāni.
tika-abh09t:1957_0: Uppannānanti anuppannāti avattabbataṃ āpannānaṃ. Pahānāyāti pajahanatthāya. Anuppannānaṃ
tika-abh09t:1957_1: kusalānaṃ dhammānanti anibbattānaṃ kosallasambhūtānaṃ dhammānaṃ. Uppādāyāti uppādanatthāya.
tika-abh09t:1957_2: Uppannānanti nibbattānaṃ. Ṭhitiyāti ṭhitatthāya. Asammosāyāti anassanatthaṃ. Bhiyyobhāvāyāti
tika-abh09t:1957_3: punappunaṃ bhavanāya. Vepullāyāti vipulabhāvāya. Bhāvanāyāti vaḍḍhiyā. Pāripūriyāti
tika-abh09t:1958_0: Atthato panettha “anuppannānaṃ pāpakāna”ntiādīsu asamudācāravasena vā ananubhūtārammaṇavasena
tika-abh09t:1958_1: vā kilesānaṃ anuppatti veditabbā. Aññathā hi anamatagge saṃsāre anuppannā akusaladhammā
tika-abh09t:1958_3: anuppannāpi atthi. Tesampi uppannapubbatte sati sabbasattānaṃ ito pubbe ca āsavakkhayappasaṅgato.
tika-abh09t:1958_5: aññatarasmiṃ niccappayuttassa, ghaṭato, vāyamato ca brahmalokā āgatattā bhavavasena
tika-abh09t:1958_6: kilesesu aladdhāsevanassa sattassa kilesā na samudācaranti, aparabhāge panassa vattādīni
tika-abh09t:1958_7: vissajjetvā kusītassa carato ceva akalyāṇamittādito kilesesu laddhāsevanassa ca ayonisomanasikāraṃ,
tika-abh09t:1958_8: sativossaggañca āgamma uppajjanti. Evaṃ tāva asamudācāravasena kilesānaṃ anuppatti veditabbā.
tika-abh09t:1959_0: Ekaccassa pana tasmiṃ attabhāve ananubhūtapubbaṃ dibbādibhedaṃ manāpiyaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh09t:1959_1: labhitvā tattha ayonisomanasikārasativossagge āgamma kilesā uppajjanti, alabhitvā
tika-abh09t:1960_1: tesaṃ vibhāgo uppannattike vuttova. Aparampi catubbidhaṃ uppannaṃ samudācāraārammaṇādhiggahitaavikkhambhitaasamugghātitavasena.
tika-abh09t:1960_2: Tattha sampati vattamānaṃyeva samudācāruppannaṃ nāma. Sesaṃ pākaṭameva. Yasmā panettha
tika-abh09t:1961_0: Kathaṃ pana maggakkhaṇe anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ uppādāya vāyāmo hoti, kathañca uppannānaṃ
tika-abh09t:1961_1: ṭhitiyāti? Maggappavattiyā eva. Maggo hi pavattamāno pubbe anuppannapubbattā anuppanno
tika-abh09t:1961_2: nāma vuccati. Yā cassa pavatti, ayameva ṭhiti nāmāti ayaṃ tāvettha padattho.
tika-abh09t:1962: Dhammabhedo panetthāpi ekasseva vīriyassa kiccabhedato catudhā vuttāti ayamettha pāḷimuttavinicchayo.
tika-abh09t:1963_0: Vibhaṅganayato pana suttantabhājanīye tāva cattāro sammappadhānā lokiyalokuttarakusalacittasampayuttavīriyavasena
tika-abh09t:1963_1: akusalādipadehi saddhiṃ vitthārato vibhattā. Abhidhammabhājanīyapañhāpucchakesu panete
tika-abh09t:1963_2: lokuttarakusalacittasampayuttavaseneva vibhattā, phalacittasampayuttā pana na gahitā.
tika-abh09t:1963_3: Teneva pañhāpucchake “kusalā eva, vipākadhammadhammā eva, apacayagāminova, sekhāvā”tiādinā
tika-abh09t:1963_4: vuttā. Seso panettha vinicchayo satipaṭṭhāne vuttanayānusārena veditabbo.
tika-abh09t:1966_0: Iddhipādavibhaṅgamātikāya pana cattāro iddhipādāti ettha ijjhatīti iddhi, samijjhati
tika-abh09t:1966_1: nipphajjatīti attho, iddhi eva pādo iddhipādo, iddhikoṭṭhāsoti attho. Ijjhanti vā
tika-abh09t:1966_2: etāya sattā iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā hontītipi iddhi, pajjanti etenāti pādo, patiṭṭhā
tika-abh09t:1966_4: ettha chandahetuko, chandādhiko vā samādhi chandasamādhi, kattukamyatāchandaṃ adhipatiṃ
tika-abh09t:1966_5: karitvā paṭiladdhasamādhissetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Padhānabhūtā saṅkhārā padhānasaṅkhārā,
tika-abh09t:1966_6: catukiccasādhakassa sammappadhānavīriyassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Samannāgatanti tena chandasamādhinā,
tika-abh09t:1966_7: padhānasaṅkhārena ca upetaṃ. Iddhipādanti yathāvuttatthena “iddhī”ti saṅkhyaṃ gatānaṃ
tika-abh09t:1966_9: pādabhūtasesacittacetasikarāsiṃ. Bhāvetīti vaḍḍheti, attano santāne punappunaṃ janetīti
tika-abh09t:1966_10: attho. Iminā nayena sesesupi attho veditabbo. Tattha vīmaṃsāti paññā. Sesaṃ padato suviññeyyameva.
tika-abh09t:1967_0: Atthato panettha tena kiṃ kathitaṃ? Catunnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ matthakappattaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-abh09t:1967_1: kathitaṃ. Yathā hi catūsu amaccaputtesu ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā vicarantesu eko upaṭṭhānena,
tika-abh09t:1967_2: eko sūrabhāvena, eko jātisampattiyā, eko mantabalenāti evaṃ te paccekakāraṇena rājānaṃ
tika-abh09t:1967_3: ārādhetvā ṭhānantaraṃ pāpuṇanti, evaṃ bhikkhūpi chandavīriyacittavīmaṃsāsu ekekaṃ
tika-abh09t:1967_4: jeṭṭhaṃ dhuraṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā lokuttaradhammanibbattakā honti. Ettha ca chando
tika-abh09t:1967_5: samādhi padhānasaṅkhāroti tayo dhammā iddhīpi honti iddhipādāpi, sesā pana sampayuttā
tika-abh09t:1967_6: cattāro khandhā iddhipādā eva. Evaṃ sesādhipatiyuttacittesupi iddhipādāti veditabbā.
tika-abh09t:1968_0: Apica jhānavipassanāsu pubbabhāgo iddhipādo. Yo paṭilābho, sā iddhi. Paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ
tika-abh09t:1968_1: hi pubbabhāgaparikammāni iddhipādo nāma, paṭhamajjhānādayo iddhi nāma. Paṭhamamaggādīnaṃ
tika-abh09t:1968_2: pubbabhāgavipassanā iddhipādo nāma, paṭhamamaggādayo iddhi nāma. Paṭilābhavasenāpi
tika-abh09t:1968_3: dīpetuṃ vaṭṭati. Paṭhamajjhānādayo hi paṭhamamaggādayo ca iddhipādo nāma, dutiyajjhānādayo,
tika-abh09t:1968_4: dutiyamaggādayo ca iddhi nāmāti ayaṃ tāvettha padattho.
tika-abh09t:1969_0: Dhammabhedo panettha vibhaṅganayeneva pākaṭo bhavissati. Tattha hi suttantabhājanīye
tika-abh09t:1969_1: tāva chandādīnaṃ padānaṃ vibhaṅgaṃ vatvā ante “iddhipādoti tathābhūtassa vedanākkhandho…pe…
tika-abh09t:1969_2: viññāṇakkhandho. Iddhipādaṃ bhāvetīti te dhamme āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti, tena
tika-abh09t:1969_3: vuccati iddhipādaṃ bhāvetī”ti evaṃ sabbe lokiyalokuttaradhammā iddhipādoti vuttā.
tika-abh09t:1970_0: Abhidhammabhājanīye pana chandādīni padāni vibhajitvā ante “iddhipādoti tathābhūtassa
tika-abh09t:1970_1: phasso…pe… paggāho avikkhepo”ti evaṃ sabbe lokuttarakusaladhammā iddhipādāti vatvā
tika-abh09t:1970_2: puna “chandiddhipādo vīriyiddhipādo cittiddhipādo vīmaṃsiddhipādo”ti mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā
tika-abh09t:1970_3: “tattha katamo chandiddhipādo? Idha bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti…pe…
tika-abh09t:1970_4: yo tasmiṃ samaye chando chandikatā…pe… ayaṃ vuccati chandiddhipādo”tiādinā lokuttarakusalacittasampayuttachandavīriyacittavīmaṃsā
tika-abh09t:1970_5: eva iddhipādāti vuttā. Tathā pañhāpucchakepi kusalā eva, anidassanaappaṭighā eva,
tika-abh09t:1970_6: vīmaṃsiddhipādo hetu, sesā na hetū…pe… cittiddhipādo na vattabbo, sesā cittasampayuttā…pe…
tika-abh09t:1970_7: anuttarāva, araṇāvāti. Sesamettha satipaṭṭhāne vuttasadisameva. Pāḷimuttakanayo panetthāpi na uddhaṭoti.
tika-abh09t:1973_0: Bojjhaṅgavibhaṅgamātikāya pana atthato tāva – satta bojjhaṅgāti ettha bodhiyā, bodhissa
tika-abh09t:1973_1: vā aṅgāti bojjhaṅgā. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yāya eva dhammasāmaggiyā maggakkhaṇe uppajjamānāya
tika-abh09t:1973_3: dhammasāmaggiyā ariyasāvako bujjhati, kilesaniddāya uṭṭhahati, saccāni vā paṭivijjhati,
tika-abh09t:1973_4: tassā dhammasāmaggisaṅkhātāya bodhiyā aṅgāti bojjhaṅgā jhānaṅgamaggaṅgāni viya. Yo
tika-abh09t:1973_5: panesa yathāvuttappakārāya etāya dhammasāmaggiyā bujjhatīti katvā ariyasāvako “bodhī”ti
tika-abh09t:1973_6: vuccati, tassa bodhissa aṅgāti bojjhaṅgā senaṅgarathaṅgādayo viya. Apica “bodhāya
tika-abh09t:1973_7: saṃvattantīti bojjhaṅgā”tiādinā paṭisambhidānayenāpi bojjhaṅgattho veditabbo. Pasattho,
tika-abh09t:1973_8: sundaro vā bojjhaṅgo sambojjhaṅgo, satiyeva sambojjhaṅgo satisambojjhaṅgo. Evaṃ sesesupi.
tika-abh09t:1973_9: Tattha dhamme vicināti aniccādito parivīmaṃsati jānāti, dhamme vā etena sattā vicinantīti
tika-abh09t:1973_10: dhammavicayo, paññā. Upekkhati samarasānaṃ dhammānaṃ hāpanavaḍḍhane avāvaṭatāya paṭisaṅkhānākārena
tika-abh09t:1973_11: majjhattā hotīti upekkhā, tatramajjhattatā. Paṭisaṅkhānalakkhaṇo hi upekkhāsambojjhaṅgoti.
tika-abh09t:1973_12: Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva. Ayaṃ tāvettha padattho. Dhammabhedopettha suviññeyyova.
tika-abh09t:1974_0: Vibhaṅganayato panettha suttantabhājanīye tāva lokiyalokuttaravasena sesesu lokuttarakusalavipākavasena
tika-abh09t:1974_1: vibhattā. Pañhāpucchake pana siyā kusalā, siyā abyākatā, pītisambojjhaṅgo sukhāya
tika-abh09t:1974_2: vedanāya sampayuttova, sesā dvīhi…pe… pītisambojjhaṅgo sukhasahagatova, sesā tidhāpi,
tika-abh09t:1974_3: anidassanaappaṭighā, dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo hetu, sesā na hetū…pe… rūpāvacarāva,
tika-abh09t:1974_4: araṇāvāti. Sesaṃ satipaṭṭhāne vuttanayameva. Ayamettha vibhaṅganayo.
tika-abh09t:1978_0: Tattha kamato tāva ayampi desanākkamova. Sabbesaṃ hi bojjhaṅgānaṃ upakārattā satisambojjhaṅgo
tika-abh09t:1978_1: paṭhamaṃ vutto, tato yasmā upaṭṭhitasatiko dhamme paññāya pavicināti, pavicitadhammo
tika-abh09t:1978_2: vīriyaṃ ārabhati, āraddhavīriyassa pīti uppajjati, pītimanassa kāyopi cittampi passambhati,
tika-abh09t:1978_3: passaddhakāyassa sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyati, samāhitacitto taṃ cittaṃ sādhukaṃ ajjhupekkhitā
tika-abh09t:1978_4: hoti, tasmā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādayo yathākkamaṃ vuttāti ayaṃ tāvettha kamo.
tika-abh09t:1979_0: Tāvattato pana kasmā te satteva vuttā, anūnā anadhikāti? Līnuddhaccapaṭipakkhato,
tika-abh09t:1979_1: sabbattikato ca. Ettha hi tayo bojjhaṅgā līnassa paṭipakkhā. Yathāha – “yasmiṃ ca
tika-abh09t:1979_2: kho, bhikkhave, samaye līnaṃ cittaṃ hoti, kālo tasmiṃ samaye dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa
tika-abh09t:1979_3: bhāvanāya, kālo vīriya…pe… pītisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāyā”ti. Tayo uddhaccassa paṭipakkhā.
tika-abh09t:1979_4: Yathāha – “yasmiṃ ca kho, bhikkhave, samaye uddhataṃ cittaṃ hoti, kālo tasmiṃ samaye
tika-abh09t:1979_5: passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya, kālo samādhi…pe… upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāyā”ti.
tika-abh09t:1979_6: Eko panettha loṇadhūpanaṃ viya sabbabyañjanesu sabbabojjhaṅgesu icchitabbo. Yathāha
tika-abh09t:1979_7: – “satiñca khvāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sabbatthikaṃ vadāmī”ti. Evaṃ līnuddhaccapaṭipakkhato
tika-abh09t:1979_8: ca sabbatthikato ca satteva vuttāti ayaṃ tāvattato.
tika-abh09t:1980_0: Hetubhūmivibhāgatoti ettha hetuvibhāgato tāva – cattāro satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya
tika-abh09t:1980_2: tadadhimuttatāti. Tathā satta dhammā dutiyassa paripucchakatā vatthuvisadakiriyā
tika-abh09t:1980_4: tadadhimuttatāti. Tattha ajjhattikabāhirānaṃ sarīraparikkhārabhūtānaṃ vatthūnaṃ visadabhāvakaraṇaṃ
tika-abh09t:1980_5: vatthuvisadakiriyā nāma. Tathā ekādasa dhammā tatiyassa apāyabhayagamanavīthidāyajjamahattasatthumahattajātimahattasabrahmacārimahattānaṃ
tika-abh09t:1980_8: gantabbo”ti paccavekkhaṇā vīthipaccavekkhaṇā nāma. “Dāyakehi dinnapiṇḍapātassa mahapphalataṃ
tika-abh09t:1980_9: sampādessāmī”ti attānaṃ damanaṃ piṇḍapātāpacāyanaṃ nāma. Tathā ekādasa dhammā catutthassa
tika-abh09t:1980_12: satta dhammā pañcamassa paṇītabhojanasevanatā, utusukhairiyāpathasukhasevanatā dve
tika-abh09t:1980_14: Ekādasa dhammā chaṭṭhassa vatthuvisadakiriyā indriyasamattapaṭipādanā nimittakusalatā
tika-abh09t:1980_16: parivajjanasevanatā dve, jhānavimokkhapaccavekkhaṇatā tadadhimuttatāti. Tattha kasiṇādinimittānaṃ
tika-abh09t:1980_17: uggahaṇakusalatā nimittakusalatā nāma. Pañca dhammā sattamassa sattasaṅkhārakelāyanamajjhattapuggalānaṃ
tika-abh09t:1980_18: parivajjanasevanatā dve dve, tadadhimuttatāti. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana
tika-abh09t:1981_0: Bhūmivibhāgato panete kāmāvacarā, lokuttarā vā honti, kāmāvacaresu balavavipassanādīsu
tika-abh09t:1981_1: eva bojjhaṅgā labbhanti, na itaresu. Lokuttaresu pana sabbattha labbhanti, rūpāvacarārūpāvacaracittesu
tika-abh09t:1981_2: sabbathā na labbhanti abodhipakkhikattā. Keci pana therā vipassanāpādakesu kasiṇāsubhabrahmavihārajjhānesupi
tika-abh09t:1981_3: bojjhaṅge uddharanti, na ca te paṭisiddhā aṭṭhakathācariyehi, tasmā tesaṃ matena
tika-abh09t:1981_4: rūpāvacarāpi honti, na kenaci pariyāyena arūpāvacarāti ayamettha bhūmivibhāgo.
tika-abh09t:1982_0: Vivekatoti ettha vivekoti vivittatā, svāyaṃ pañcavidho tadaṅgavikkhambhanasamucchedapaṭipassaddhinissaraṇavivekavasena.
tika-abh09t:1982_1: Tadaṅgavivekoti vipassanā, vikkhambhanavivekoti aṭṭha samāpattiyo, samucchedavivekoti
tika-abh09t:1982_2: maggo, paṭipassaddhivivekoti phalaṃ, nissaraṇavivekoti sabbanimittanissaṭaṃ nibbānaṃ.
tika-abh09t:1982_4: kiccato tadaṅgavivekanissitā, ajjhāsayato nissaraṇavivekanissitā. Maggakāle pana
tika-abh09t:1982_5: kiccato samucchedavivekanissitā, ārammaṇato nissaraṇavivekanissitā, phalakkhaṇe kiccato
tika-abh09t:1982_6: paṭipassaddhivivekanissitā. Ārammaṇato nissaraṇavivekanissitā ca honti. Kesañci therānaṃ
tika-abh09t:1982_8: hontīti ayamettha viveko. Evaṃ viññeyyo pāḷimuttavinicchayo.
tika-abh09t:1985_0: Maggaṅgavibhaṅgamātikāya pana atthato tāva – ariyoti taṃtaṃmaggavajjhakilesehi ārakattā,
tika-abh09t:1985_1: ariyabhāvakarattā ca ariyo, aṭṭha aṅgāni assāti aṭṭhaṅgiko, nibbānatthikehi maggīyati,
tika-abh09t:1985_2: nibbānaṃ vā maggati, kilese vā mārento gacchatīti maggo. Seyyathidanti so katamoti
tika-abh09t:1985_3: ce, idāni svāyaṃ maggo caturaṅginī viya senā aṅgamattameva hoti, aṅgavinimutto natthīti
tika-abh09t:1985_4: dassento “sammādiṭṭhi…pe… sammāsamādhī”ti āha. Tattha sammā passatīti sammādiṭṭhi,
tika-abh09t:1985_5: paññā. Sammā saṅkappeti takketīti sammāsaṅkappo, vitakko. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva. Tato
tika-abh09t:1986_0: Abhidhammabhājanīye pana viratittayavajjito pañcaṅgikopi maggo vibhatto, tañca pañcannaṃ
tika-abh09t:1986_1: aṅgānaṃ kiccādhikataṃ, viratīnañca avuttasiddhataṃ sandhāya, virativajjitassa pana
tika-abh09t:1987_0: Pañhāpucchakepi sammāsaṅkappo sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttova, sesā dvīhi. Sammāsaṅkappo
tika-abh09t:1987_1: avitakkavicāramatto, pītisahagato sukhasahagatova, na upekkhāsahagato, sesā tidhāpi.
tika-abh09t:1987_2: Sammādiṭṭhi hetu, sesā nahetūti ayaṃ viseso. Sesaṃ samameva. Idāni pana –
tika-abh09t:1990_0: Tattha kamato tāva ayampi desanākkamova. Bhagavatā hi nibbānādhigamāya paṭipannassa
tika-abh09t:1990_2: desitā. Tato heraññikassa kahāpaṇaparivattakahattho viya yathāsabhāvadassanassa sammādiṭṭhiyā
tika-abh09t:1990_3: bahūpakārattā sammāsaṅkappo. Svāyaṃ yathā sammādiṭṭhiyā, evaṃ sammāvācāyapi upakārako.
tika-abh09t:1990_4: Yathāha “pubbe kho, gahapati, takketvā vicāretvā pacchā vācaṃ bhindatī”ti, tasmā
tika-abh09t:1990_5: tadanantaraṃ sammāvācā. Yasmā pana vācāya saṃvidahitvā loke kammante payojenti, tasmā
tika-abh09t:1990_6: tadanantaraṃ sammākammanto. Kāyavacīduccaritaṃ pahāya ubhayasucaritaṃ pūrentasseva
tika-abh09t:1990_7: yasmā ājīvaṭṭhamakaṃ sīlaṃ pūrati, na itarassa, tasmā tadubhayānantaraṃ sammāājīvo
tika-abh09t:1990_8: vutto. Evaṃ “visuddhadiṭṭhisīlenāpi ettāvatā paritosaṃ akatvā idaṃ vīriyaṃ ārabhitabba”nti
tika-abh09t:1990_9: dassetuṃ tadanantaraṃ sammāvāyāmo. Āraddhavīriyenāpi kāyādīsu sati sūpaṭṭhitā kātabbāti
tika-abh09t:1990_10: dassanatthaṃ tadanantaraṃ sammāsati. Sūpaṭṭhitāya satiyā ekattārammaṇe cittaṃ samādhātuṃ
tika-abh09t:1990_11: sakkāti tadanantaraṃ sammāsamādhi vuttoti ayaṃ tāvettha kamo.
tika-abh09t:1991_0: Kiccato panesaṃ ekekassa tīṇi tīṇi kiccāni, seyyathidaṃ – sammādiṭṭhi tāva aññehipi
tika-abh09t:1991_1: attano paccanīkakilesehi saddhiṃ micchādiṭṭhiṃ pajahati, ārammaṇato nirodhasaccaṃ
tika-abh09t:1991_2: sacchikaroti, asammohato sesasaccāni paṭivijjhati. Evaṃ sammāsaṅkappādīnaṃ micchāsaṅkappapajahanādivasena
tika-abh09t:1991_3: yathānurūpanti kiccatā veditabbā. Visesato panettha sammāsaṅkappo sahajātadhamme
tika-abh09t:1991_4: abhiniropeti, sammāvācā pariggaṇhāti, sammākammanto samuṭṭhāpeti, sammāājīvo vodāpeti,
tika-abh09t:1991_5: sammāvāyāmo paggaṇhāti, sammāsati upaṭṭhāpeti, sammāsamādhi samādahatīti idamettha kiccaṃ.
tika-abh09t:1992_0: Bhedato pana pubbabhāge sammādiṭṭhi “dukkhe ñāṇa”ntiādinā catūsu saccesu ñāṇavasena
tika-abh09t:1992_1: nānakkhaṇā nānārammaṇā nānānāmā hoti, dutiyo pana nekkhammaabyāpādaavihiṃsāsaṅkappavasena,
tika-abh09t:1992_4: nānārammaṇā nānānāmā honti. Maggakāle panete sammādiṭṭhiādayo ekakkhaṇā ekārammaṇā.
tika-abh09t:1992_5: Kiccato pana tāni pubbabhāge nānānāmāni labhanti, sammāsamādhi pana pubbabhāgepi
tika-abh09t:1992_6: maggakkhaṇepi catukkapañcakajjhānavasena nānakkhaṇo nānānāmo, maggakkhaṇe pana ekārammaṇo
tika-abh09t:1992_7: hoti. Ekassa hi paṭhamamaggo pādakajjhānādiniyamato paṭhamajjhānādiko vā dutiyajjhānādīsu
tika-abh09t:1992_8: aññatarajjhāniko vā, dutiyamaggādayopissa paṭhamamaggasadisajjhānikā vā visadisajjhānikā
tika-abh09t:1992_9: vāti so maggakālepi nānakkhaṇo nānānāmo vāti ayamettha bhedo.
tika-abh09t:1993: Bhūmito ca vivekato ca vinicchayo bojjhaṅgesu vuttānusārena veditabboti evaṃ vijānīyo pāḷimuttavinicchayo.
tika-abh09t:1996_0: Jhānavibhaṅgamātikāya pana atthato tāva – pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvutotiādīsu pātimokkhanti
tika-abh09t:1996_1: sikkhāpadasīlaṃ. Taṃ hi yo naṃ pāti rakkhati, taṃ mokkheti moceti āpāyikādīhi dukkhehi,
tika-abh09t:1996_2: tasmā “pātimokkha”nti vuccati. Saṃvaraṇaṃ, saṃvaranti vā tenāti saṃvaro, pātimokkhameva
tika-abh09t:1996_3: saṃvaro pātimokkhasaṃvaro, kammavācāpariyosāne ijjhanakassa atthato cetanādirūpassa
tika-abh09t:1996_4: pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlassevetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tena saṃvuto pihitakāyavacīpayogoti pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto.
tika-abh09t:1996_5: Viharatīti iriyati pavatteti. Ācāragocarasampannoti ettha ācaritabbato ācāro, gāvo
tika-abh09t:1996_6: caranti etthāti gocaro, gunnaṃ caraṇaṭṭhānaṃ. Taṃsadisatāya pana sabbopi pavattivisayo
tika-abh09t:1996_7: gocaroti veditabbo. Tesaṃ vibhāgo niddese vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
tika-abh09t:1998_0: “Ācāragocarasampannoti atthi ācāro, atthi anācāro. Tattha katamo anācāro? Kāyiko
tika-abh09t:1998_1: vītikkamo, vācasiko vītikkamo, kāyikavācasiko vītikkamo, ayaṃ vuccati anācāro, sabbampi
tika-abh09t:1998_2: dussīlyaṃ anācāro, idhekacco veḷudānena vā patta…pe… pupphaphalasinānadantakaṭṭhadānena
tika-abh09t:1998_3: vā cāṭukamyatāya vā muggasupyatāya vā pāribhaṭutāya vā jaṅghapesanikena vā aññataraññatarena
tika-abh09t:1998_4: vā buddhapatikuṭṭhena micchāājīvena jīvikaṃ kappeti, ayaṃ vuccati anācāro.
tika-abh09t:2001_0: “Gocaroti atthi gocaro, atthi agocaro. Tattha katamo agocaro? Idhekacco vesiyāgocaro
tika-abh09t:2001_1: vā hoti, vidhavā…pe… thullakumārīpaṇḍakabhikkhunīpānāgāragocaro vā, saṃsaṭṭho viharati
tika-abh09t:2001_2: rājūhi rājamahāmattehi titthiyehi titthiyasāvakehi ananulomikena saṃsaggena, yāni
tika-abh09t:2001_3: vā pana tāni kulāni assaddhāni appasannāni…pe… tathārūpāni kulāni sevati bhajati
tika-abh09t:2002: “Tattha katamo gocaro? Idhekacco na vesiyāgocaro hotī”tiādinā –
tika-abh09t:2004_2: paṭipakkhavasena kāyikavācasiko ācāro veditabbo. Apica bhikkhu sagāravo sappatisso
tika-abh09t:2004_3: hirottappasampanno sunivattho supāruto pāsādikena abhikkantādinā okkhittacakkhu iriyāpathasampanno
tika-abh09t:2004_4: ābhisamācārikesu sakkaccakārī garucittīkārabahulo viharati, ayaṃ vuccati ācāro. Gocaro
tika-abh09t:2004_5: pana tividho upanissayagocaro ārakkhagocaro upanibandhagocaroti. Tattha dasakathāvatthuguṇasamannāgato
tika-abh09t:2004_6: kalyāṇamitto upanissayagocaro nāma. Antaragharādīsu okkhittacakkhutādīhi disā vidisā
tika-abh09t:2004_7: anoloketvā gamanaṃ ārakkhagocaro nāma. Cattāro pana satipaṭṭhānā upanibandhagocaro
tika-abh09t:2004_8: nāma. Yattha cittaṃ upanibandhati, ayaṃ tividhopettha gocaroti veditabbo. Imināti
tika-abh09t:2004_9: iminā ācārena, gocarena ca samannāgato ācāragocarasampanno nāma.
tika-abh09t:2005_0: Aṇumattesu vajjesūti aṇuppamāṇesu dosesu. Bhayadassāvīti bhayadassanasīlo, aṇumattaṃ
tika-abh09t:2005_1: reṇuṃ sinerusadisaṃ passanto viya sabbalahukampi dukkaṭadubbhāsitamattaṃ pārājikasadisaṃ
tika-abh09t:2005_2: katvā vajjato bhayato dassanasīloti attho. Samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesūti yaṃ kiñci
tika-abh09t:2005_3: sikkhāpadesu sikkhitabbaṃ, taṃ suṭṭhu ādāya gahetvā sikkhati.
tika-abh09t:2006_0: Indriyesu guttadvāroti manacchaṭṭhesu indriyesu rūpādiārammaṇanimittādīnaṃ aggahaṇasaṅkhātasatisaṃvarena
tika-abh09t:2006_1: pihitadvāro. Bhojane mattaññūti piṇḍapāte paṭiggahaṇaparibhogesu paccavekkhaṇañāṇavasena
tika-abh09t:2006_2: ceva appicchatādīhi ca mattajānanako, piṇḍapātavasena cettha catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ
tika-abh09t:2006_3: gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Atha vā bhuñjitabbato bhojananti catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ gahaṇaṃ
tika-abh09t:2006_4: veditabbaṃ. Pubbarattāpararattanti ettha aḍḍharattisaṅkhātāya rattiyā pubbe pubbarattaṃ,
tika-abh09t:2006_5: iminā paṭhamayāmañceva pacchābhattañca gaṇhāti. Rattiyā pacchā apararattaṃ, iminā
tika-abh09t:2006_6: pacchimayāmañceva purebhattañca gaṇhāti. Pacchimayāmo panassa bhikkhuno niddākilamathavinodanokāsoti na gahito.
tika-abh09t:2007_1: āsevanabhāvanaṃ anuyutto caṅkamananisajjāhi yonisomanasikārena āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi
tika-abh09t:2007_2: cittaparisodhane yuttappayuttoti attho. Sātaccaṃ nepakkanti satataṃ pavattayitabbato
tika-abh09t:2007_3: sātaccasaṅkhātaṃ vīriyaṃ, paripākagatattā nepakkasaṅkhātañca paññaṃ anuyuttoti sambandho.
tika-abh09t:2008_0: Idāni taṃ jāgariyānuyogaṃ sarūpato dassento “bodhipakkhikānaṃ dhammāna”ntiādimāha.
tika-abh09t:2008_1: Bodhipakkhikānaṃ dhammānanti catusaccāvabodhasaṅkhātassa maggañāṇassa pakkhe bhavānaṃ
tika-abh09t:2008_3: ekārammaṇe pavattanasamatthatāya satta bojjhaṅgā eva niddiṭṭhā. Tesaṃ gahaṇena pana
tika-abh09t:2008_4: sesānampi tattha gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. So abhikkante paṭikkantetiādīsu abhikkantaṃ
tika-abh09t:2008_5: vuccati purato gamanaṃ, paṭikkantaṃ nivattanaṃ, tadubhayañca ṭhānanisajjāsayanesupi
tika-abh09t:2008_6: purato, pacchato ca kāyassa abhigamanaapagamanavasena labbhati. Sampajānakārī hotīti
tika-abh09t:2008_7: sampajaññena sabbakiccakārī, sampajaññasseva vā kārī, sampajañña-ggahaṇena cettha
tika-abh09t:2008_8: avippayogato satipi gahitāva hoti. Tenevassa niddese “sato sampajāno abhikkamatī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh09t:2009_0: Ālokitetiādīsu ālokitaṃ nāma purato pekkhanaṃ. Vilokitaṃ nāma anudisāpekkhanaṃ. Imesaṃ
tika-abh09t:2009_1: pana dvinnaṃ gahaṇena heṭṭhā upari pacchato pekkhanasaṅkhātāni olokitullokitāpalokitānipi
tika-abh09t:2010_0: Samiñjite pasāriteti pabbānaṃ samiñjane, pasāraṇe ca. Saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇeti
tika-abh09t:2010_2: ca paribhogo dhāraṇaṃ nāma. Asiteti piṇḍapātādibhojane. Pīteti yāguādipāne. Khāyiteti
tika-abh09t:2010_4: ca passāvassa ca karaṇe. Gateti gamane. Ṭhiteti ṭhāne. Nisinneti nisajjāya. Sutteti
tika-abh09t:2010_5: sayane. Jāgariteti jāgaraṇe. Ettha ca bhikkhācāragamanādivasena “abhikkante”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh09t:2010_6: Vihāre pana caṅkamanādiiriyāpathavaseneva “gate”tiādi vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Bhāsiteti
tika-abh09t:2011_0: Sabbesu pana tesu abhikkantādīsu paccekaṃ sātthakasampajaññaṃ sappāyasampajaññaṃ
tika-abh09t:2011_1: gocarasampajaññaṃ asammohasampajaññanti catubbidhaṃ sampajaññaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tattha
tika-abh09t:2011_2: abhikkamitukāmatādicitte uppanne cittavaseneva gamanādiṃ akatvā “kiṃ nu me tattha
tika-abh09t:2011_3: gatena attho”ti pariggaṇhitvā cetiyadassanādino tassa tassa atthassa pariggaṇhanaṃ
tika-abh09t:2011_4: sātthakasampajaññaṃ nāma. Sātthakesu panetesu gamanādīsu jīvitabrahmacariyantarāyānañceva
tika-abh09t:2011_6: pariggahetvā sappāyapariggaṇhanaṃ sappāyasampajaññaṃ nāma. Evaṃ pariggahitasātthakasappāyassa
tika-abh09t:2011_7: pana aṭṭhatiṃsāya kammaṭṭhānesu, vipassanāya vā attano abhirucitaṃ kammaṭṭhānasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-abh09t:2011_8: gocaraṃ avissajjetvāva abhikkamādīnaṃ karaṇaṃ gocarasampajaññaṃ nāma. Abhikkamādīsu
tika-abh09t:2011_9: pana andhabālaputhujjanā “attā abhikkamādīni karoti, ahaṃ karomī”ti vā sammuyhanti,
tika-abh09t:2011_11: ayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāto aṭṭhisaṅghāṭo abhikkamādīni karoti, tato añño abbhantare attā vā
tika-abh09t:2011_12: satto vā abhikkamanto vā paṭikkamanto vā…pe… tuṇhī bhavanto vā natthī”ti evamādinā
tika-abh09t:2011_13: yāthāvato jānanavasena paññāya pavattanaṃ asammohasampajaññaṃ nāma. Ayamettha saṅkhepo,
tika-abh09t:2012_0: Idāni yasmā yassa abbhantare yathāvuttā ettakā guṇā natthi, tassa araññavāso pana
tika-abh09t:2012_1: makkaṭādīnaṃ viya anucchaviko na hoti, upacāramattampissa jhānaṃ na uppajjati. Yassa
tika-abh09t:2012_2: pana santi, tassa araññavāso anucchaviko hoti. So hi tattha sabbappakārajjhānaṃ nibbattetuṃ
tika-abh09t:2012_3: sakkoti, araññavāsañceva āraññake ca upasobheti, sakalañca sāsanaṃ pasādeti, tasmā
tika-abh09t:2012_4: evarūpassa bhikkhuno upāsanaṭṭhānayogapathaṃ sappāyasenāsanaṃ dassento “so vivittaṃ
tika-abh09t:2012_5: senāsanaṃ bhajatī”tiādimāha. Tattha vivittanti suññaṃ. Seti ceva āsati ca etthāti
tika-abh09t:2012_6: senāsanaṃ, mañcādi, vihārādi ca. Tenevassa niddese “mañco pīṭha”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh09t:2013_0: Idāni aññampissa pabhedaṃ dassetuṃ “arañña”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha araññanti vinayapariyāyena
tika-abh09t:2013_1: tāva ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañca avasesaṃ, suttantapariyāyena ca āraññakaṃ bhikkhuṃ
tika-abh09t:2013_2: sandhāya pañcadhanusatikaṃ pacchimaṃ araññanti vuttaṃ, abhidhammapariyāyena pana
tika-abh09t:2013_3: gāmadvārassa indakhīlato bahi sabbaṃ “arañña”nti gahetabbaṃ. “Nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā”ti
tika-abh09t:2013_4: hi vuttaṃ. Kandaranti kaṃ vuccati udakaṃ, tena daritaṃ udakena bhinnaṃ pabbatapadesaṃ,
tika-abh09t:2013_6: maṇivitānasadise sandacchāye vanagahane nisīditvā maṇikkhandhasadise udake sandamāne
tika-abh09t:2013_7: sītena vātena bījiyamānassa samaṇadhammaṃ karoto cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti. Giriguhanti
tika-abh09t:2013_8: dvinnaṃ pabbatānamantaraṃ, ekasmiññeva vā umaṅgasadisaṃ mahāvivaraṃ. Vanapatthanti
tika-abh09t:2013_9: gāmantaṃ atikkamitvā manussānaṃ anupacāraṭṭhānaṃ, yattha na kasanti na vapanti. Tenevassa
tika-abh09t:2014_0: Abbhokāsanti acchannaṃ. Ākaṅkhamāno panettha cīvarakuṭiṃ katvā vasati. Palālapuñjanti
tika-abh09t:2014_1: palālarāsiṃ. Mahāpalālapuñjato hi palālaṃ nikkaḍḍhitvā pabbhāraleṇasadise ālaye karonti,
tika-abh09t:2014_2: gacchagumbādīnampi upari palālaṃ pakkhipitvā heṭṭhā nisīdanti, taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh09t:2014_3: Appasaddantiādīsu vacanasaddena virahitattā appasaddaṃ. Nagaranigghosasaddena ceva
tika-abh09t:2014_4: migapakkhinigghosena ca rahitattā appanigghosaṃ. Vijanavātanti anusañcarakajanassa
tika-abh09t:2014_5: sarīravātena virahitattā vijanavātaṃ, “vijanavāda”ntipi pāṭho. Senāsanassa anto janavādasaddena
tika-abh09t:2014_6: rahitanti attho. Manussānaṃ rahassa kiriyārahattā manussarāhasseyyakaṃ, tato tato
tika-abh09t:2014_7: paṭinivattitvā sammadeva kammaṭṭhāne cittassa līyanato paṭisallānasaṅkhātassa vivekassa
tika-abh09t:2014_8: bhāvanārāmassa anurūpattā paṭisallānasāruppaṃ. Bhajatīti sambandho. Araññagatotiādīsu
tika-abh09t:2014_9: araññaṃ, rukkhamūlañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ sabbampi senāsanaṃ suññāgārena saṅgahitaṃ.
tika-abh09t:2015_0: Pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvāti samantato ūrubaddhāsanaṃ bandhitvā. Ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāyāti
tika-abh09t:2015_1: uparimakāyaṃ ujuṃ ṭhapetvā, aṭṭhārasa piṭṭhikaṇṭake koṭiyā koṭiṃ paṭipādetvā. Evaṃ
tika-abh09t:2015_2: nisinnassa hi cammamaṃsanahārūni na paṇamanti, athassa tesaṃ apaṇamanapaccayā khaṇe
tika-abh09t:2015_3: khaṇe vedanā na uppajjanti, tato cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti, kammaṭṭhānaṃ vuddhiṃ upagacchati.
tika-abh09t:2015_4: Parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāti kammaṭṭhānābhimukhaṃ satiṃ paṭṭhapetvā, mukhasamīpe
tika-abh09t:2015_5: vā katvā. Tenevassa niddese “ayaṃ sati upaṭṭhitā hoti sūpaṭṭhitā, nāsikagge vā mukhanimitte
tika-abh09t:2015_6: vā”ti vuttaṃ. Mukhanimittanti cettha uttaroṭṭhassa vemajjhapadeso, yattha nāsikāvāto
tika-abh09t:2015_7: paṭihaññati. Atha vā “parīti pariggahaṭṭho, mukhanti niyyānaṭṭho, satīti upaṭṭhānaṭṭho,
tika-abh09t:2015_8: tena vuccati parimukhaṃ sati”nti vaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttanayenapettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh09t:2016_0: Abhijjhaṃ loketiādīsu abhimukhaṃ jhāyati cintetīti abhijjhā, rāgo. Lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena
tika-abh09t:2016_1: loko, pañcupādānakkhandhā. Tesu kāmacchandaṃ vikkhambhetvāti attho. Vikkhambhanavaseneva
tika-abh09t:2016_2: vigatābhijjhena, na cakkhuviññāṇādisadisenāti attho. Cetasāti cittena, itthambhūto
tika-abh09t:2016_3: viharatīti attho. Abhijjhāyāti abhijjhāto. Cittaṃ parisodhetīti yathā naṃ sā muñcitvā
tika-abh09t:2016_4: na puna gaṇhāti, evaṃ parimocetīti attho. Byāpajjati iminā cittaṃ pūtikummāsādayo
tika-abh09t:2016_5: viya pakatiṃ jahātīti byāpādo. Vikārappattiyā padussati, paraṃ vā padūseti vināsetīti
tika-abh09t:2016_6: padoso, ubhayampetaṃ kodhassevādhivacanaṃ. Yasmā cetaṃ sabbakammaṭṭhānasādhāraṇavasena
tika-abh09t:2016_7: desīyati, tasmā “sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampī”ti evaṃ mettāvasena avatvā “abyāpannacitto”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ.
tika-abh09t:2017_0: Thinaṃ cittassa gelaññaṃ, middhaṃ cetasikānaṃ. Ālokasaññīti rattiyampi divāpi diṭṭhaālokasañjānanasaññāya
tika-abh09t:2017_1: samannāgato, tāya pana ālokasaññāya thinamiddhavinodanassa visesato satisampajaññaṃ
tika-abh09t:2018_0: Anuddhatoti avikkhitto tathā eva ajjhattaṃ vūpasantacitto. Tiṇṇavicikicchoti vicikicchaṃ
tika-abh09t:2018_1: atikkamitvā ṭhito. Akathaṃkathī kusalesu dhammesūti anavajjadhammesu “kathaṃ ime,
tika-abh09t:2018_2: kathaṃ ime”ti evaṃ pavattanato kathaṃkathīsaṅkhātāya vicikicchāya virahito. Evaṃ
tika-abh09t:2018_3: pañcanīvaraṇappahānaṃ dassetvā idāni yasmā appahīnanīvaraṇassa jhānaṃ na uppajjati,
